quote: I'm a human just like anyone else. We all have our problems that we deal with on and off the field. I'm thankful to have a beautiful wife and child that can help ease those problems when you come home.
author: Torrey Smith

quote: Many of our prayers were not answered, and for this we are now grateful.
author: William Feather

quote: Such lovely warmth of thought and delicacy of colour are beyond all praise, and equally beyond all thanks!
author: Marie Corelli

quote: We in the United States should be all the more thankful for the freedom and religious tolerance we enjoy. And we should always remember the lessons learned from the Holocaust, in hopes we stay vigilant against such inhumanity now and in the future.
author: Charlie Dent

quote: Fame is a funny thing. I like doing normal things. I like going to fairs. I like going to ball games. I like going to Disney World or a big field on the Fourth of July and having picnics with friends. The problem is you're either worried you're going to be recognized, or you're thankful you're not. It's always there.
author: Chris Evans

quote: I feel like I'm doing what I love. If I can get out, shoot, film and climb, and be with my friends and family, I'm happy. It doesn't take a lot. I don't need to climb huge mountains. I have a deep connection with wilderness and the environment, and I'm thankful for that.
author: Jimmy Chin

quote: A single grateful thought toward heaven is the most perfect prayer.
author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: Thank God we're living in a country where the sky's the limit, the stores are open late and you can shop in bed thanks to television.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: All our discontents about what we want appeared to spring from the want of thankfulness for what we have.
author: Daniel Defoe

quote: I'm thankful to have Jesus as my Savior. My relationship with God has always been one to where I'm talking to him all day, every day, about anything and everything. It's just a continuous ongoing conversation that I have with the Lord, and I feel like that's brought me closer to Him.
author: Josh Turner

quote: I'm thankful for the three ounce Ziploc bag, so that I have somewhere to put my savings.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: Years ago, it was pretty hard to get people to empathize even a little bit with scaly, cold-blooded critters; now, thanks a lot to good PR from television, it is easier to get the message of reptile conservation and tolerance across. We have a lot to be thankful to reptiles for, not the least of which is their control of rodents.
author: Romulus Whitaker

quote: My mother is such an incredibly strong woman. She raised a family of five boys extremely well. She made us all strong, loving, caring people. We all support each other. I'm really thankful to her.
author: Henry Cavill

quote: I don't know about changing my perspective, because motherhood is such a glorious blessing and I am very thankful for that. It's such a beautiful experience. I so strongly recommend it. It's bliss, love and fulfillment of another level.
author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quote: My mother had abandoned the family, so grandmother raised me. And she was instrumental in that she taught me that the world is a glorious place. She taught me to embrace humanity. And she'd say there's never an excuse for joy. And to be thankful.
author: Jewell Parker Rhodes

quote: I think being raised spending so much time outdoors was really important - while you're in it, you might not know, but now I think of the things I was thankful for.
author: Jewel

quote: I realized this is what God has dealt me, and I should be thankful considering all that's happened to me in my life, but MS caused the movies to stop - stop dead - and I miss it.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: If I'm not working, I have home time with my family, and if I spend that stressing what's going to happen next, then it's a waste. I have a lot to be thankful for.
author: Ewen Bremner

quote: Thanks to the Interstate Highway System, it is now possible to travel across the country from coast to coast without seeing anything.
author: Charles Kuralt

quote: Dear Lord, I'm so grateful I'm still loved.
author: Vivien Leigh

quote: I'm definitely aware that the physical appearance is a very temporary gift. I'm very thankful for the opportunities that I've been able to experience, but I keep it all in check and don't let it consume me.
author: Marisa Miller

quote: I'm thankful for the incredible advances in medicine that have taken place during my lifetime. I almost certainly wouldn't still be here if it weren't for them.
author: Billy Graham

quote: A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I am thankful, of course, for the prize and thankful to God for each story, each idea, each word, each day.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Every one of our greatest national treasures, our liberty, enterprise, vitality, wealth, military power, global authority, flow from a surprising source: our ability to give thanks.
author: Tony Snow

quote: We sing a little song before we eat, a little blessing before we eat, and it's really - we're thanking the Lord and the Earth for the food that we eat, and it really brings you together in a profound kind of way.
author: Phil Lesh

quote: I'm thankful for the ability to share my faith in a lot of different places. It's something that I take as a responsibility and an obligation to handle as best as I can.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: I'm thankful I grew up the way I did. It made me a hard worker and insightful to other people's lives.
author: Rachel Roy

quote: I realize how unique my path has been. And I'm thankful for that.
author: Vanessa Paradis

quote: The 'Night Train' has already been a crazy ride for me. We flew around making TV appearances and stadium announcements all over the country, fueled by little more than coffee and adrenaline... so many fans jumped on board with us, and I couldn't be more thankful.
author: Jason Aldean

quote: My relationship with God is what gives me a moral compass on what decisions to make and that stuff. I'm thankful that I have the people around me that I do, and they remind me each day of who I am and what I stand for.
author: Alyson Stoner

quote: We can be thankful President Barack Obama is taking aim at one of the prime causes of climate change and extreme weather: air pollution. The EPA's carbon pollution standards are the most significant step forward our country has ever taken to protect our health by addressing climate change.
author: Donna Brazile

quote: I'm proud - or really more thankful than anything - for all the work that I've gotten.
author: Annie Ilonzeh

quote: You can think you're living in the moment and you're thankful, but when somebody comes face to face with you and says, 'I just lost my child,' or 'I have months to live, and thank you...' I'm of course sad for them, but I'm thankful that I gave them a gift and they're giving me a gift.
author: Tig Notaro

quote: There was no instruction to be thankful that the Christians were special people, chosen people. There was no nationalistic, political or ethnic superiority to be thankful for.
author: John Clayton

quote: I am both honored and blessed to have had such a wonderful career with the L.A. Galaxy and I am thankful for everything the club, the fans and the community has done for me and my family.
author: Cobi Jones

quote: I'm thankful enough or blessed enough to be able to say that Miles Davis was a friend when he was alive, and he was a wonderful mentor and really, really funny, you know.
author: Prince

quote: I'm just thankful to be blessed with my talent.
author: Ty Dolla Sign

quote: I'm thankful for all the things that this job has given me and my family. But probably the thing that I am most proud of throughout my career is that, not only myself, but my family and the people around me have just been regular people, which we are.
author: Brett Favre

quote: I wouldn't be where I am without my fans, and I am very thankful for them.
author: Kygo

quote: I actually feel I'm in a much better place than I've ever been because I'm thankful people still love the songs that I've written, and they seem to like me. And they come to the shows in droves, and they get all excited, and I can still hit all the notes, and I don't look terrible.
author: Don McLean

quote: My fans are definitely my shareholders, and I'm extremely thankful for them.
author: Jacob Whitesides

quote: I am just so thankful that my mom was a fantastic mom. She wasn't a stage mother she didn't push me. She was happy if I was happy. We are so different. I was very shy my mom did all the talking. She was my strength. She never expected that I would be this ballerina.
author: Patricia McBride

quote: I'm thankful for not ever taking anything illegal.
author: Pedro Martinez

quote: Unfortunately, I'm not 185 and 6-3 and can run and catch fade routes all game. I do the dirty work. I'm all good. I'm thankful for it. Somebody's got to do it.
author: Darnell Dockett

quote: I feel very, very thankful to have the family that I do.
author: Matt Bomer

quote: I'm grateful for the opportunities God gave me to minister to people in high places; people in power have spiritual and personal needs like everyone else, and often they have no one to talk to.
author: Billy Graham

quote: I'm very thankful that I can make people happy just by signing my name.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Look folks, we know who built this country and we know who is going to rebuild it. It's you. Instead of vilifying you, we should be thanking you. We owe you.
author: Joe Biden

quote: There is such a thing as 'thanks-feeling' - feeling thankful. This ought to be the general, universal spirit of the Christian.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: I think everything is going to be devastatingly sad - when the phone rings, I know somebody in my family's been hurt, somebody's going to die. I'm sure a therapist would go, 'That's not a good way to live,' but every time it's not that bad thing, I'm so thankful and appreciative.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: I'm thankful that I was able to have a long, healthy career for the most part.
author: Scottie Pippen

quote: I have got good films, and I am thankful to Aditya Chopra. He put a lot of faith in me.
author: Anushka Sharma

quote: I'm so thankful to have been born in the times that we live in.
author: Matt Bomer

quote: Music is very powerful and can make you feel whatever it is. If you listen to gospel, you're going to feel thankful, and you're going to want to call up people that you hate and tell them that you love them. When you listen to sexual music, it gets you in the mood.
author: R. Kelly

quote: God has blessed me with an unbelievable talent, with fast feet, fast hands, unbelievable defense and a very, very sharp mind. So I'm thankful for that.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I am a big defender of 'Harry Potter,' and I think any book that gets kids to read are books that we should cherish, we should be thankful for them.
author: Judy Blume

quote: If you reflect often on how His Atonement has changed you, and if you give thanks often, you will find that your witness of Him gains power to touch the hearts of others. When those you invite out of your own testimony feel that witness, they will come to accept Him as their Lord and Savior.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: I'm really thankful for every experience I've had, even the ones that were puzzling or disorienting, because they taught me so much.
author: Tavi Gevinson

quote: Unseasonable kindness gets no thanks.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Well, there's not a day goes by when I don't get up and say thank you to somebody.
author: Rod Stewart

quote: I'm happy with who I am inside. I'd hate to have accolades and all that and not really be happy with who I was. So I'm really thankful for my family and for the support system that I have for being the person that I am today. I'm proud of who I am.
author: Keke Palmer

quote: I'm very happy that major players are always giving their opinions about my life, my game. I am very thankful for that.
author: Neymar

quote: Why I got into music was James Taylor, so to see him be a real down-to-earth guy that's unbelievably talented... then to hear him sing those lyrics of 'What I'm Thankful For,' which is a song Ms. Yearwood and I got to write together, that was definitely a highlight of my recording life.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: I'm very thankful to be doing what I'm doing. I feel very blessed.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: I'm just really, really thankful. I'm thankful to the doctors; I'm thankful to the family that donated the kidney.
author: Natalie Cole

quote: I've been blessed in that regard through and through. So I'm just thankful for this opportunity to play the game that I love and share that with the world.
author: Stephen Curry

quote: I kind of just write what I like to write. I'm thankful that readers of different ages seem to connect to my stories. I don't consciously think about age demographics when I'm working on my comics.
author: Gene Luen Yang

quote: Anytime that another artist or a critic that is well-respected says something nice about you, you're always thankful and hope that you can live up to that.
author: Chris Stapleton

quote: To do what I love every day and have the support of the fans, it does not happen like this all the time, so it is important to be thankful... I know it doesn't last forever, and we have to get it while we can.
author: Cole Swindell

quote: I think there is no racism in this film industry. They are only in need of talent, though it takes time; but, if you are talented, you will get your due. I am thankful to be part of this industry.
author: Nawazuddin Siddiqui

quote: I'm happy and thankful that people are messing with the Dolla $ign.
author: Ty Dolla Sign

quote: I'm thankful I am able to continue to share the joy and the inspiration tap brings.
author: Savion Glover

quote: I was a filmy kid. I was two when I faced the camera for the first time. My parents realised it pretty early, and I'm really thankful to them for their support and help.
author: Rakul Preet Singh

quote: There's definitely no hard feelings with WWE. I'm very thankful to them for the opportunity that was given to me.
author: Rey Mysterio

quote: I've been very close to Konnan for many years now. I thank him for much of my success in this industry. He opened the doors for me in AAA, ECW, and WCW. I'm very thankful.
author: Rey Mysterio

quote: We've always had each other's backs in and out of competition. We support each other the most because we're the only ones that know what it's like to go through what we do, and so we can't be more thankful for each other. We're like sisters.
author: Simone Biles

quote: I am incredibly thankful for the strong support I have from my peers in the industry and of course my amazing fans.
author: Miranda Lambert

quote: I found out that superstars Winkler and William Shatner are real people, and I was so thankful for that.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: We are just so thankful that Christ does not measure us by what we do. God is not measuring us by that, He is measuring us by our faith in Christ.
author: Ben Zobrist

quote: You can expect nothing in being a musician, and you have to be just very thankful every time it goes positively for you.
author: Halsey

quote: When I started acting, I thought if I got one or two jobs a year I'd be lucky. So yeah, my career has gone so much farther than I ever suspected it would, and as such I feel lucky for everything I get. I feel thankful and grateful.
author: James McAvoy

quote: I was in the postseason twice and I'm thankful for that.
author: Ryne Sandberg

quote: I'm very thankful I'm very appreciative for everything that the Denver Broncos organization has done for me.
author: Brock Osweiler

quote: I have a fine level of recognition in the business and among the acting community now, so I consider myself one of the lucky ones. If I didn't think that, there would be something wrong with me. I'm grateful and thankful for what I've got.
author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quote: I am really thankful to the audiences that they have appreciated all my songs and I have managed to touch their soul.
author: Mohit Chauhan

quote: That's what I love about my faith and Christianity. It's the polar opposite of darn near everything I experienced in the wrestling business. I still love the business, and I'm thankful for everything that it's provided, but the idea that it deals in the truth is the furthest thing from reality.
author: Shawn Michaels

quote: I learn more with every job, and I'm very thankful for where I am.
author: Liam Hemsworth

quote: Most people repent their sins by thanking God they ain't so wicked as their neighbors.
author: Josh Billings

quote: It was a free-for-all with music when I was growing up. My mother was a huge music fanatic so I was listening to everything from country to heavy metal to Indigo Girls to Elton John. I guess when I was really young I didn't like Willie Nelson, and she obviously loved him. Now I do too, I'm so thankful to her for playing his music nonstop.
author: Tig Notaro

quote: I'm so thankful that there are people willing to do that - to actually carry a child nine months for someone.
author: GloZell

quote: My fans have made all my career moments special for me. They are the ones that have gotten me through every single thing - good times and bad, they are who I go to and lean on. I am very thankful for that.
author: Mariah Carey

quote: I know how I want to operate as an artist. And that is by having an honest, genuine dialogue about this kind of screwed up journey I've had that I'm so thankful for.
author: Mary Lambert

quote: I want to let my fans get to know a little about me. I'm very thankful for everything they've done for me so, of course, I'm going to let them into my world a bit. But I really am a very private person, and I love kepping my life to myself - that's how I've always been.
author: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: Thankfully, while our self-righteousness reaches far, God's grace reaches farther.
author: Tullian Tchividjian

quote: There's no ex out there who I'm not friends with today, and I'm extremely thankful for that.
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: While the women of the older generation were thankful if only they succeeded in obtaining 'a work and a duty,' however monotonous and wearing it might be, the will of the younger generation for a pleasurable labour has fortunately increased.
author: Ellen Key

quote: The only jobs kids have are to do well in school, to be charming and polite, and be thankful. That's it. I'll house you, protect you, I'll even give my life for you, and in return, you will behave.
author: Gene Simmons

quote: The first thing I do when I start my day is, I get down on my hands and knees and give thanks to God. Whenever I go outside of my house, the first thing I do is stop at the church.
author: Mark Wahlberg

quote: I get along very well with the cast of '30 Rock.' I guess I bring a certain quirkiness to the show as well. I'm just thankful they keep asking me. I didn't think I was going to be asked back so every time they say, 'We want you back,' I'm screaming. I'm jumping up and down and screaming.
author: Sherri Shepherd

quote: If you sell the film rights to your book, it doesn't mean there will be a film. I have sold the rights to five books and had zero films made. Take the money and be thankful.
author: Matt Haig

quote: Readers of fiction read, I think, for a deeper embrace of the world, of reality. And that's brave. I never get over being thankful for that - for the courage of my readers.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: I'm thankful for the work that feminists like Gloria Steinem have done. I am a feminist, but the geography for women today is vastly different than it was in the '60s.
author: Amber Heard

quote: I'm thankful for serendipitous moments in my life, where things could've gone the other way.
author: Rick Springfield

quote: My music is my No. 1, and I've got people who believe in me and keep me going. I'm thankful.
author: Jon Pardi

quote: I'm just very thankful. And I say that a lot because that's the most important message.
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: 'In A World...' changed my life a thousand per cent. I feel thankful that something I believed in so much - I love dialect, so I dedicated five years of my life to making a film about it - yielded such rewards. It led to 'Man Up,' as well as 'No Escape,' which comes out later this year... two movies where I am the female lead.
author: Lake Bell

quote: I am thankful that geniuses and artists and good people, no matter how hard it is, will eventually be recognized. I am doubly thankful that also goes for idiots.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: I am thankful I was born in America, although if I gain any more weight the burqa thing may start to seem like a good idea to me. See? Another plus about America, you can always find some food.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: I am thankful that all the people in the world who absolutely, positively, know what God wants, usually kill mostly each other.
author: Elayne Boosler

quote: I say grace. I'm a big believer in grace. I happen to believe in a God that made all the food and so I'm pretty grateful for that and I thank him for that. But I'm also thankful for the people that put the food on the table.
author: Alton Brown

quote: Adidas is just right. They've been, like, a partner I couldn't be more thankful for. I really feel like they've helped increase my popularity. You know? It's tight to be able to attach to their brand and be able to add whatever I can offer to their brand. It's nice to know that they appreciate it. They are always showing love.
author: Big Sean

quote: I'm very thankful to the Yankees and to Major League Baseball for allowing me to play this game.
author: Alex Rodriguez

quote: Looking back, I am thankful that I didn't go into the film industry.
author: Hideo Kojima

quote: Many times I sit back and say, 'I can't believe that this is my life!' Other times, I feel self-satisfied. I mean, there's a lot to be proud and thankful for but, nonetheless, it's just a life!
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: I'm so thankful for the Internet because actors and singers and performers now have a way to connect with their fans on a very personal level which I think is quite special.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: Rip Rig & Panic was a milestone for me, and I've always been really thankful that I did that when I was 16. It saved me for when I suddenly became really successful later on. So even when my head's been spinning like a banshee, my feet still feel held down to the ground.
author: Neneh Cherry

quote: I'm thankful my parents obliged me to live with the unvarnished truth: I might not have been a looker, but I was a better speller than the prettiest girl in my class, and I was funnier, too.
author: Laurie Graham

quote: China has not established the rule of law and if there is a power above the law there is no social justice. Everybody can be subjected to harm. I'm just a citizen: my life is equal in value to any other. But I'm thankful that when I lost my freedom so many people shared feelings and put such touching effort into helping me.
author: Ai Weiwei

quote: I will forever be thankful to the Malawians and international community, and my professional army and army general, who said: 'No, we will follow the constitution.' That's why I'm here.
author: Joyce Banda

quote: Being away from home was tough, but the challenge and the thrill of being on Broadway was so fulfilling, and I'm thankful to my husband for making it possible and holding it down at home.
author: Nicole Ari Parker

quote: I've gone to normal clubs, straight clubs, and I've gone to gay clubs to party with my friends and fans. There's no difference. I have nothing to prove. I'm very comfortable in my own skin, and I'm thankful to have as many close gay friends as I have, people who have been so supportive in my life and have always been there for me.
author: Nick Jonas

quote: I'm actual thankful for the amount of responsibility that has been handed to me. I feel very honored.
author: Samira Wiley

quote: My time at Pop has been a transformative experience that I am extremely proud of. It has afforded me the chance to collaborate with some of the greatest creative minds in the world, and I'm thankful to Ashley Heath and Bauer Media for the opportunity.
author: Dasha Zhukova

quote: I turn to someone, I'm not sure, to God I think, but I never ask for anything. I would never pray to win a title; it makes no sense. I've never understood those who pray before a match. I simply give thanks for what I have received.
author: Mario Balotelli

quote: I am thankful to the Nobel committee for recognising the plight of millions of children who are suffering in this modern age.
author: Kailash Satyarthi

quote: Every musician, their goal in life is to play music that people love, and I've accomplished my goal. I was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and left that chapter of my life and those people in the past. Good and bad, I've loved and am thankful for that chapter.
author: Steven Adler

quote: I'm one of the most fortunate people in the world.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Even now, when I try and think of band names just randomly, I'm so thankful that 'fun.' is the name of the band. I never really think twice about it. It is so simple and so easy.
author: Nate Ruess

quote: I'm grateful for my brokenness. I'm grateful for my humility.
author: James McGreevey

quote: I love going to Africa and stuff. I love going anywhere, really, but I've been to Africa a bunch of times and it's just a beautiful place that needs help, obviously, but helping people that are really thankful is really easy to do. And the people out there always seem so thankful.
author: Kris Allen

quote: I feel so thankful that I'm able to be a part of something that I love to wake up and run to work every day.
author: Alexander Wang

quote: What's blessed about my life is that I have been able to connect with the global audience on a regular basis. I am thankful for everybody's love, and I reciprocate that, but I also have to deliver on every occasion.
author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quote: I'm just thankful that even at a young age, I got to experience something like 'X Factor,' and I got to meet enough people just to know that I needed to be patient until the right deal came around.
author: Jacob Whitesides

quote: Every morning, I wake up and think about 10 different things I'm thankful for, and I continue to spread that love throughout the day, always visualizing, meditating, and growing.
author: Shameik Moore

quote: I don't need a holiday or a feast to feel grateful for my children, the sun, the moon, the roof over my head, music, and laughter, but I like to take this time to take the path of thanks less traveled.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: I'm thankful that my memory is good because my vision is going.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: I'm thankful for Sarah Palin's vice presidential bid, which taught us that Alaska is not in a box off the coast of California.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: I had a somewhat religious upbringing. Not strict, but it was there, and I'm kind of thankful for that. If you grow up just watching MTV, that's its own form of religion, and it's not even based on happiness or communal responsibility. I mean, try to construct a worldview out of that.
author: Win Butler

quote: I am thankful to whatever I have got in my life, but one thing which is always at the back of my mind is my dance academy. I would love to see my dance academy growing.
author: Madhuri Dixit

quote: I work hard, and I'm thankful people recognize that.
author: Ander Crenshaw

quote: And I'm very surprised that all this stuff actually worked out to where I could have a career in film, gain the benefit of my education, and be thankful that I was able to break into my craft as an actor.
author: Terrence Howard

quote: I'm really aware of the conversations that surround young actresses in Hollywood. I always get myself into a hole with these conversations, and I get weirdly quoted, and I sound militant and like I'm not thankful at all, and I'm so thankful of everything that's happening. But I'm an active observer of the machinations of this world.
author: Mackenzie Davis

quote: I am so thankful for the genius of Phil Spector, for his recognition of my talent to be the main voice of his Wall of Sound.
author: Darlene Love

quote: At a certain point, when I let go and was done - when I stopped and could say I was blessed and thankful to be a champion, when I finally enjoyed life from this different perspective - that's when I healed. Letting go healed me.
author: Dominick Cruz

quote: I think all of us are thankful every day we get to put this uniform on, and we play this game. So try not to take any days for granted. Every time you take the field, give a hundred percent and leave it all out there.
author: Jacob deGrom

quote: This is something I've wanted to do my whole life is play baseball, and I think just the opportunity to put on a big-league uniform every day is just... you know, people dream of it, but not everybody gets to do it. I'm thankful every day I get to do it.
author: Jacob deGrom

quote: I've got tapes that I'm so thankful that my father made - old reel-to-reel tapes. I've got a ton of those things at home. He kept those like fine diamonds, I mean he kept them, you know, in a box and was very, very careful of them, you know.
author: Ricky Skaggs

quote: I think there is a difference between Slate and Salon. I think we both serve important functions on the Internet. As more and more Websites disappear, I'm thankful Slate is still around because it makes things less lonely.
author: David Talbot

quote: I'm really thankful and complimented when people come to me and say, thank you for the great times for all these years. But I don't think about it as being a leader.
author: Bill Kreutzmann

quote: I'm so thankful for my one year at regular high school in White Plains.
author: Jennifer Damiano

quote: I'm thankful to be here in Cleveland, and I believe this is where I belong.
author: Josh Gordon

quote: Certainly my parents were a huge influence. They always expected the most out of all of us. And expected us to do our very best. I'm thankful to them for allowing me to do what I wanted to do.
author: Laurel Clark

quote: It makes me feel so amazing to know there's people out here that support me and follow me on Twitter and watch my shows on YouTube and come to my concert, so I'm very thankful.
author: Austin Mahone

quote: As an artist, you're thankful to get a shot at a story more than once, because it doesn't happen all the time. Whether you talk about 'Hamlet' or 'Death of a Salesman,' you always want to see what the next group of actors will do.
author: Kenny Leon

quote: I am very thankful that I have lived the life I have lived. I am thankful for my Graves' disease, and I tell people, if I had my whole life to live over, I would have it, because it has really made me into the person that I am.
author: Gail Devers

quote: I've been very fortunate. I feel very thankful. I've been able to come home and do some fun things and make it exciting for people here at home.
author: Roger Clemens

quote: The truth is, after Boys Don't Cry, I realized how few and far between the great roles are. I am beyond thankful for finding Million Dollar Baby.
author: Hilary Swank

quote: I feel like I still am struggling in a lot of different ways. I still have to fight for certain things. Certain jobs. At least I'm working and I'm thankful for that.
author: Gina Gershon

quote: I'm thankful God has given us the technology where we can see each other through Skype on the computer. It's not the same thing, but at least we can see each other. Imagine the time before when that wasn't available and people had to go defend our country. It's really hard. I go two weeks without seeing my family and I go crazy.
author: Albert Pujols

quote: You're always aware that only eight per cent of actors are in work at one time, so you've got to be thankful for the job you've got and do the best you can.
author: Ben Hardy

quote: Certainly the research shows that grateful people are more innovative thinkers.
author: Deborah Norville

quote: I know for me like I have a reputation of being kind of tough, I have a reputation of also being the girl next door, kind of sweet but I have standards and my thing is, it's me on that screen and I don't have control over everything in this and I'm grateful and thankful.
author: Nia Long

quote: We have to be thankful to the Czechs that they did their duty. The Czech Republic won, I can't believe it. It was a huge party with all the people here.
author: Ruud van Nistelrooy

quote: As a husband, father and public servant, I'm thankful for the counsel and wisdom of my older brothers - Bill, who was a priest, and Kevin, who is a priest.
author: Denis McDonough

quote: I am going to spend my time today just thanking the people that played a role in my career, because I truly do believe that I was blessed by a lot of people that paths crossed mine as I went down the road in my career.
author: Nolan Ryan

quote: I still don't look at myself as a star. I've always had a thankful heart.
author: Brenda Lee

quote: I'm so thankful for my family and friends - they're really supportive. Everyone I work with on 'Austin & Ally;' the cast and crew are like my family now. We have so much fun, and I'm so happy they're in my life!
author: Laura Marano

quote: 'Idol' was groundbreaking television. I am very fortunate to have won the show at the time. 'Idol' changed my life, and I am thankful.
author: Taylor Hicks

quote: I bless God for this retirement: I never was more thankful for any thing than I have been of late for the necessity I am under of self-denial in many respects.
author: David Brainerd

quote: I'm just really thankful to have the chance to portray a character you don't see every day.
author: Regina King

quote: I remember, the first time I came to the United States in 1996, I didn't speak a word of English at the beginning. I am very thankful for this country and the opportunity music has given me... My three kids were born here in Miami; they speak Spanish at home, but English with all their friends.
author: Juanes

quote: If I can do one hundredth part for the Indian that Mrs. Stowe did for the Negro, I will be thankful.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: I'm really looking forward to the Hall of Fame ceremonies. It's going to be unbelievable - just crazy. I'm looking forward to thanking all the fans for inspiring me to go out there and play my best football each and every game.
author: Jerry Rice

quote: My dog wants the entrepreneurial community to know how thankful she is for the fact that she gets to go out. She has heard more pitches than probably much of the world.
author: Heidi Roizen

quote: I've had bad jobs. Now I have a good one. I'm thankful.
author: Maurice Greene

quote: I am thankful to Nichia Chemical Corporation and its founder Nobu Ogawa, who gave me the research opportunity to create a blue LED.
author: Shuji Nakamura

quote: I've had this unbelievable amount of good fortune and I'm just so thankful for it. But at the same time I feel exceptionally guilty. I have so many friends who are talented graduates of Juilliard and are exceptional actors and I'm the lucky one that somehow got such a fortunate break.
author: Matthew Gray Gubler

quote: I'm just thankful to have a tour and work something I can focus on.
author: Jerry Cantrell

quote: There's a lot of women in the WNBA. There's a lot of women who could be here. To be voted by the fans says a lot - that people are aware of what's going on. I'm really thankful. I think they just really appreciate my talent so I'm definitely grateful.
author: Lisa Leslie

quote: I mean you got to thank your parents for giving you the right genes.
author: Eric Heiden

quote: My first languages are German and Spanish because I was brought up by a Spanish mother and a German father, so I always spoke both languages at home. I'm very thankful that I was brought up in a bilingual house.
author: Daniel Bruhl

quote: I'm very thankful to players like John Stockton and Spud Webb. They've made it possible for someone like me to make it. I think teams are actually looking for one player under 6-feet now, because they make things happen.
author: Scott Brooks

quote: Well, my first languages are German and Spanish because I was brought up by a Spanish mother and a German father, so I always spoke both languages at home. I'm very thankful that I was brought up in a bilingual house.
author: Daniel Bruhl

quote: I am glad and thankful that my husband forced me to start reading for pleasure, as it took me years to listen to him and pick up a book!
author: Rachel Tucker

quote: I'm really thankful to God, man. Like now, I'm really making a real comeback with my group. With or without a record, with or without a movie. And behind all the negative press behind this movie.
author: Ike Turner

quote: I've been allowed to grow over the past twenty years. I've managed to avoid being trapped in one moment of my career and for that, I'm very thankful.
author: Giovanni Ribisi

quote: The Atlanta Braves are really all that our children know about this crazy baseball life, and we are so thankful for this upbringing for them.
author: Tim Hudson

quote: I'm so thankful for that struggling period. That time is really great where you have no idea what's going to happen.
author: Abbi Jacobson

quote: I'm just so lucky - my office is a racetrack. That is something I'm very thankful for. It's exciting, and it's challenging, and there are a lot of emotions and nerves that come with it, but right there before the gates open, before that minute and a half or two minutes of the race, it just hits you.
author: Chantal Sutherland

quote: I'm thankful to get the opportunity to direct. I hope I don't mess it up.
author: Mark Harmon

quote: Al is, and always has been, the person who has been the candidate - the elected official. And he is the one who makes policy. As his wife, I have the wonderful opportunity to advocate for causes that I am passionate about, and I'm thankful for that.
author: Tipper Gore

quote: If you're going to have a heart attack, mine was the kind to have. I'm thankful that it hasn't affected my output or my capacity to perform. And it has given me a lot to think and write about.
author: Peter Hammill

quote: And I'm so thankful that I've been allowed to show another side of Trish.
author: Trish Stratus

quote: Really, I'll go anywhere at any time to continue working in theater - it's a passion that I'm thankful I still have. It keeps me creative and on my toes and meeting great people. I can't imagine a better way of working than on a play.
author: Laurie Metcalf

quote: By and large, the gospel of grace is neither proclaimed, understood, nor lived.
author: Brennan Manning

quote: As we look forward to freedom, the shining city on the hill and the best days of America lying ahead, it is the men and women in uniform who protect, defend and make us proud to whom we should look and give thanks every night.
author: Robin Hayes

quote: I'm so happy and thankful I made it a point be a stay-at-home mom.
author: Candace Cameron Bure

quote: As both a local resident and a parent with a CF-afflicted child, I'm thankful for companies like Canon, Chase and Outback who believe that giving back to the community is critical to their role as corporate citizens.
author: Boomer Esiason

quote: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
author: Alafair Burke

quote: A federal judge did as he was supposed to do and upheld the Constitution. We should be thankful that we have judiciary that will do that.
author: Michael Newdow

quote: I'm certainly thankful for what the Cubs did for me. I respect their organization. It's the same way with the Atlanta Braves, an awfully fine organization. I respect everybody who's down there, and that's still where I live today. But the Cardinals represent the best years of my career.
author: Bruce Sutter

quote: Look, if I ever stop being grateful for gigs, I just need to stop. Because this business is... you know, it's just so kind of job-to-job, and the fact that I've continued working... I'm just incredibly thankful for it. And I never, ever take it for granted.
author: Tony Hale

quote: It's just been a lot of hard work and lot of auditions. A lot of ups and downs, but a lot of ups, and I'm really happy for my downs, too. I'm really thankful.
author: Bresha Webb

quote: I tell people to be thankful that Madonna is showing that it's possible to be ageless - people should applaud and celebrate that. Anybody who criticises her is just jealous!
author: Tracy Anderson

quote: Let a nation's fervent thanks make some amends for the toils and sufferings of those who survive.
author: Edward Everett

quote: I am most thankful to Almighty Providence for mercies received, and determined still to press the case into public notice as a token of gratitude.
author: William Banting

quote: Eventually I booked a 2-line role on a show called 'JAG' and slowly the parts got bigger and better. I'm very thankful that I had to appreciate how difficult the business is before I had any kind of success.
author: Samuel Witwer

quote: I have spent over 60 years bent over a guitar and to know that I wrote 70 compositions that masters have recorded, that makes me feel so good and full, and proud and thankful to the good Lord.
author: Jerry Reed

quote: I have always been thankful that so many of our country's greatest leaders and statesmen were able to be on this earth at the same time and place to draft the Constitution.
author: Bob Latta

quote: I'm thankful to say that I already have my dream job. I wouldn't trade it for anything.
author: Nathan Kress

quote: As the daughter of a 25-year veteran of the armed forces, I am incredibly thankful for the sacrifices our women and men have made in Iraq, and continue to make in Afghanistan.
author: Barbara Lee

quote: I think pregnancy, like life, is what you make it. I received a good hand. I'm thankful and blessed and so peaceful and can't wait to welcome my son.
author: Mara Brock Akil

quote: Working on 'Gossip Girl' was a fantastic experience. It was my first real gig and I'm thankful for it - I got to learn a lot. I'm glad I got to explore getting comfortable in my own shoes in the background on a show like 'Gossip Girl.'
author: Dreama Walker

quote: But I'm very thankful that no one is slamming my head against the wall anymore.
author: Harry Anderson

quote: I still have a lot of the stories I wrote in high school. Hand wrote... a number of them are in purple ink, rendering them illegible, a fact we should probably be forever thankful for.
author: Shiloh Walker

quote: I was pretty sheltered growing up. I just started getting into heavier music with the Tooth & Nail/Solid State era, which really kind of brought this whole thing to life for me, so I am really thankful for that label.
author: Matty Mullins

quote: I can't say I'm thankful about being German because I sometimes experience it as a huge burden. But it is an integral part of me and I wouldn't want to escape it. I have accepted it.
author: Bernhard Schlink

quote: We have to be thankful considering our number as a family we enjoy very good health generally but you may be sure me and my partner have quite enough to exercise our minds and occupy our attention.
author: John Hawley

quote: Ultimately, I want to be a good person and spread happiness through my acting. If I don't forget to be appreciative and thankful, then that would be the most important thing that I'll ever achieve.
author: Park Bo-gum

quote: I went from not knowing anything to becoming really curious and wanting to know and respecting people in the industry, realizing how hard they work. I will always be thankful for 'Top Model' for that.
author: Fatima Siad

quote: What's funny is my mom took me to the theater for the first time when I was six years old, and I was just amazed by it. I just said, 'Hey Mom, can I do this too?' And so she signed me up for little theater classes, and I remember my first audition for a play when I was seven years old was for 'The Thankful Elf.'
author: Dana Davis

quote: I'm thankful I don't have parents that I feel I need to get their attention. They've always been there for me.
author: Cierra Ramirez

quote: I've done it all. I'm thankful and proud of what I've accomplished in my life. I hope to keep doing it.
author: Ralph Stanley

quote: I'm thankful that I have lived long enough to become a legend, and I hope I deserve it.
author: Ralph Stanley

quote: The act is unjustifiable that either begs for a blessing, or, having succeeded gives no thanksgiving.
author: Merle Shain

quote: I'm just very pleased and thankful that there was a receptive audience of people that I was able to connect with.
author: Fab Five Freddy

quote: All the lessons you learn in film school from the people you hate are always the ones that are important. The lessons you think are great and thankful for never end up meaning anything to you.
author: Glenn Ficarra

quote: There are many amazing female directors that made work in more skewed times, so we should be thankful for the boundaries they pushed through.
author: Jillian Mayer

quote: I feel like I'm just doing a job. It's amazing to think that you affect other peoples' lives on such a grand scale. I'm so thankful for that, and I'm so lucky. It's hard to stop and think that people are interested in me.
author: Kip Pardue

quote: He enjoys much who is thankful for little.
author: Thomas Secker

quote: This little kid pointed at me and said, 'You look disgusting!' That was the first time I thought maybe I did. I decided I'd better start eating. I'm just thankful that I made it through with relatively few scars.
author: Susan Dey

quote: All of us, who are members of the Germanic peoples, can be happy and thankful that once in thousands of years fate has given us, from among the Germanic peoples, such a genius, a leader, our Fuehrer Adolf Hitler, and you should be happy to be allowed to work with us.
author: Heinrich Himmler

quote: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me.
author: DMX

quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
author: Mencius

quote: God gave us the gift of life it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
author: Voltaire

quote: I'm blessed and I thank God for every day for everything that happens for me.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God trust also in me.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful.
author: John Wooden

quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I believe that God put us in this jolly world to be happy and enjoy life.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: I may not be where I want to be, but thank God I am not where I used to be.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: It's just a whole different thing, and it's just that my life has been a blessing, and I thank god every day for the gifts that he has given me and for my daughter and to be able to watch her grow and be a part of her joys and her excitement and what she wants to do in life.
author: Teena Marie

quote: Faith is a living, daring confidence in God's grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times.
author: Martin Luther

quote: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I just thank God for all of the blessings.
author: James Brown

quote: If we ever forget that we are One Nation Under God, then we will be a nation gone under.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: The thing to do, it seems to me, is to prepare yourself so you can be a rainbow in somebody else's cloud. Somebody who may not look like you. May not call God the same name you call God - if they call God at all. I may not dance your dances or speak your language. But be a blessing to somebody. That's what I think.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The most important lesson that I have learned is to trust God in every circumstance. Lots of times we go through different trials and following God's plan seems like it doesn't make any sense at all. God is always in control and he will never leave us.
author: Allyson Felix

quote: God never ends anything on a negative God always ends on a positive.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Woman is a ray of God. She is not that earthly beloved: she is creative, not created.
author: Rumi

quote: Whosoever is delighted in solitude is either a wild beast or a god.
author: Aristotle

quote: It's a struggle for every young Black man. You know how it is, only God can judge us.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I cannot and will not recant anything, for to go against conscience is neither right nor safe. Here I stand, I can do no other, so help me God. Amen.
author: Martin Luther

quote: It doesn't matter where you come from, what you have or don't have, what you lack, or what you have too much of. But all you need to have is faith in God, an undying passion for what you do and what you choose to do in this life, and a relentless drive and the will to do whatever it takes to be successful in whatever you put your mind to.
author: Stephen Curry

quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I believe that God has put gifts and talents and ability on the inside of every one of us. When you develop that and you believe in yourself and you believe that you're a person of influence and a person of purpose, I believe you can rise up out of any situation.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: If you're white and you're wrong, then you're wrong; if you're black and you're wrong, you're wrong. People are people. Black, blue, pink, green - God make no rules about color; only society make rules where my people suffer, and that why we must have redemption and redemption now.
author: Bob Marley

quote: I will thank God for the day and the moment I have.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
author: Paul Dirac

quote: God already knows what we're made of, but perhaps He wants us to learn what we're made of. I think we would all agree that we learn more from our tough times than from our easy times.
author: John Bytheway

quote: Where can we go to find God if we cannot see Him in our own hearts and in every living being.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: God has given us two hands, one to receive with and the other to give with.
author: Billy Graham

quote: One of the greatest attacks of the enemy is to make you busy, to make you hurried, to make you noisy, to make you distracted, to fill the people of God and the Church of God with so much noise and activity that there is no room for prayer. There is no room for being alone with God. There is no room for silence. There is no room for meditation.
author: Paul Washer

quote: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
author: George S. Patton

quote: God gave you a gift of 86,400 seconds today. Have you used one to say 'thank you?'
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Stupidity is also a gift of God, but one mustn't misuse it.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: Ignorance is the curse of God knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I have held many things in my hands, and I have lost them all; but whatever I have placed in God's hands, that I still possess.
author: Martin Luther

quote: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: In the first place, God made idiots. That was for practice. Then he made school boards.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The most important thing is God's blessing and if you believe in God and you believe in yourself, you have nothing to worry about.
author: Mohamed Al-Fayed

quote: Beautiful music is the art of the prophets that can calm the agitations of the soul it is one of the most magnificent and delightful presents God has given us.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Oh, these vast, calm, measureless mountain days, days in whose light everything seems equally divine, opening a thousand windows to show us God.
author: John Muir

quote: Anyone can count the seeds in an apple, but only God can count the number of apples in a seed.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: I have had a happy life and thank the Lord. Goodbye and may God bless all!
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: Keep your nose out the sky, keep your heart to god, and keep your face to the raising sun.
author: Kanye West

quote: A dog barks when his master is attacked. I would be a coward if I saw that God's truth is attacked and yet would remain silent.
author: John Calvin

quote: There's a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog. I have to exert myself and really say, oh God, I've got to see my friends 'cause I'm too content being by myself.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: I can make a lord, but only God can make a gentleman.
author: King James I

quote: I believe in Jesus Christ as my Lord and savior. I believe that Jesus died for my sins, and rose again, and that's my belief. I still don't know what 'Christian' means. I'm a follower of Christ, but I keep making a whole bunch of mistakes. And I thank God for forgiveness.
author: Sherri Shepherd

quote: In the absence of any other proof, the thumb alone would convince me of God's existence.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: God made you a masterpiece - be blessed, secure, disciplined and equipped.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Don't you know there ain't no devil, it's just god when he's drunk.
author: Tom Waits

quote: Our heavenly Father understands our disappointment, suffering, pain, fear, and doubt. He is always there to encourage our hearts and help us understand that He's sufficient for all of our needs. When I accepted this as an absolute truth in my life, I found that my worrying stopped.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: Disappointment is inevitable. But to become discouraged, there's a choice I make. God would never discourage me. He would always point me to himself to trust him. Therefore, my discouragement is from Satan. As you go through the emotions that we have, hostility is not from God, bitterness, unforgiveness, all of these are attacks from Satan.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I am a person who always tries not to be easily influenced by position or achievement. I thank God for the fact that I can share more kindness and a good quality of life through the popularity. Not for the popularity itself.
author: Mario Teguh

quote: The word 'Islam' means 'peace.' The word 'Muslim' means 'one who surrenders to God.' But the press makes us seem like haters.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Our Lord has written the promise of resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in springtime.
author: Martin Luther

quote: As a child of God, I am greater than anything that can happen to me.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Perhaps nothing helps us make the movement from our little selves to a larger world than remembering God in gratitude. Such a perspective puts God in view in all of life, not just in the moments we set aside for worship or spiritual disciplines. Not just in the moments when life seems easy.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: If you expect the blessings of God, be kind to His people.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: Judge me if you want to. And as a matter of fact, it won't even count, 'cause the only person who can judge is God.
author: Kelly Rowland

quote: People face difficulties, no matter who you are. I faced difficulties with a lot of things. I face opposition every day, but I didn't kill myself and now, thank God, I'm here.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: Non-violence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A person once asked me, in a provocative manner, if I approved of homosexuality. I replied with another question: 'Tell me: when God looks at a gay person, does he endorse the existence of this person with love, or reject and condemn this person?' We must always consider the person.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Honesty is of God and dishonesty of the devil the devil was a liar from the beginning.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: A man can no more diminish God's glory by refusing to worship Him than a lunatic can put out the sun by scribbling the word, 'darkness' on the walls of his cell.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: The Christian life is not a constant high. I have my moments of deep discouragement. I have to go to God in prayer with tears in my eyes, and say, 'O God, forgive me,' or 'Help me.'
author: Billy Graham

quote: He who learns must suffer. And even in our sleep pain that cannot forget falls drop by drop upon the heart, and in our own despair, against our will, comes wisdom to us by the awful grace of God.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Beauty is mysterious as well as terrible. God and devil are fighting there, and the battlefield is the heart of man.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Whatever your heart clings to and confides in, that is really your God.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just that his justice cannot sleep forever.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Bottom line: God will not allow any person to keep you from your destiny. They may be bigger, stronger, or more powerful, but God knows how to shift things around and get you to where you're supposed to be.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: We Marines believe that God gave America the greatest gift He could bestow to man while he lived on this earth -freedom. We also believe He gave us another gift nearly as precious - our soldiers, sailors, airmen, Coast Guardsmen, and Marines - to safeguard that gift and guarantee no force on this earth can ever steal it away.
author: John F. Kelly

quote: Sir, my concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I know that there's a god because I was able to survive everything that I've been through - all of the tough times - and I'm still at the top of my game.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: If I could give you information of my life, it would be to show how a woman of very ordinary ability has been led by God in strange and unaccustomed paths to do In His service what He has done in her. And if I could tell you all, you would see how God has done all, and I nothing.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: The moment I have realized God sitting in the temple of every human body, the moment I stand in reverence before every human being and see God in him - that moment I am free from bondage, everything that binds vanishes, and I am free.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.
author: Thomas More

quote: I believe that life is a journey towards God, and that no one has the right to insist that you go a certain road.
author: Pat Buckley

quote: When the solution is simple, God is answering.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: My father always taught me that when you help other people, then God will give you double. And that's what has really happened to me. When I have helped other people who are in need, God has helped me more.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: I would rather die than do something which I know to be a sin, or to be against God's will.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: For where God built a church, there the Devil would also build a chapel.
author: Martin Luther

quote: No man is excluded from calling upon God, the gate of salvation is set open unto all men: neither is there any other thing which keepeth us back from entering in, save only our own unbelief.
author: John Calvin

quote: In my country of South Africa, we struggled for years against the evil system of apartheid that divided human beings, children of the same God, by racial classification and then denied many of them fundamental human rights.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: To my young friends out there: Life can be great, but not when you can't see it. So, open your eyes to life: to see it in the vivid colors that God gave us as a precious gift to His children, to enjoy life to the fullest, and to make it count. Say yes to your life.
author: Nancy Reagan

quote: Socialism has no moral justification whatsoever; poor people are not morally superior to rich people, nor are they owed anything by rich people simply because of their lack of success. Charity is not a socialist concept - it is a religious one, an acknowledgment of God's sovereignty over property, a sovereignty the Left utterly rejects.
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: We were born to die and we die to live. As seedlings of God, we barely blossom on earth; we fully flower in heaven.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: The Bible is one of the greatest blessings bestowed by God on the children of men. It has God for its author; salvation for its end, and truth without any mixture for its matter. It is all pure.
author: John Locke

quote: Forgiveness is God's command.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Until we meet again, may God bless you as he has blessed me.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: God removes the sin of the one who makes humble confession, and thereby the devil loses the sovereignty he had gained over the human heart.
author: Saint Bernard

quote: There is but One God. His name is Truth He is the Creator. He fears none he is without hate. He never dies He is beyond the cycle of births and death. He is self-illuminated. He is realized by the kindness of the True Guru. He was True in the beginning He was True when the ages commenced and has ever been True. He is also True now.
author: Guru Nanak

quote: God made the Idiot for practice, and then He made the School Board.
author: Mark Twain

quote: When you find your definitions in God, you find the very purpose for which you were created. Put your hand into God's hand, know His absolutes, demonstrate His love, present His truth, and the message of redemption and transformation will take hold.
author: Ravi Zacharias

quote: It's up to God to do the judging. You haven't walked in my boots, so how are you going to judge me?
author: Aaron Neville

quote: Socialism violates at least three of the Ten Commandments: It turns government into God, it legalizes thievery and it elevates covetousness. Discussions of income inequality, after all, aren't about prosperity but about petty spite. Why should you care how much money I make, so long as you are happy?
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: Allowing myself to love God completely has obviously shed light on my self-love because he loves me more than I could ever love myself.
author: Angie Stone

quote: There are two kinds of people: those who say to God, 'Thy will be done,' and those to whom God says, 'All right, then, have it your way.'
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves; and under the rule of a just God, cannot long retain it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: God is bigger than people think.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: My job is to perform, enjoy cricket and thank God for whatever he has given me.
author: Suresh Raina

quote: God works wonders now and then; Behold a lawyer, an honest man.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Zen does not confuse spirituality with thinking about God while one is peeling potatoes. Zen spirituality is just to peel the potatoes.
author: Alan Watts

quote: If I am not, may God put me there; and if I am, may God so keep me.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: We cannot embrace God's forgiveness if we are so busy clinging to past wounds and nursing old grudges.
author: T. D. Jakes

quote: Kill a man, and you are an assassin. Kill millions of men, and you are a conqueror. Kill everyone, and you are a god.
author: Beilby Porteus

quote: I think that the greatest gift God ever gave man is not the gift of sight but the gift of vision. Sight is a function of the eyes, but vision is a function of the heart.
author: Myles Munroe

quote: God is all-full. He is self-contained. He is eternal satisfaction.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: I most certainly believe that it is the gift of God that I am what I am. And so I dwell amongst barbarians, a proselyte and an exile, for the love of God.
author: Saint Patrick

quote: A dark cloud is no sign that the sun has lost his light and dark black convictions are no arguments that God has laid aside His mercy.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: I would love it if people could look at chubby folks with all of our curves, bumps and ridges and just say 'She's beautiful' just like that. You don't have to get on a treadmill as long as your blood pressure is under control and you eat healthy, God bless.
author: Yvette Nicole Brown

quote: God is the indwelling and not the transient cause of all things.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: It is not fitting, when one is in God's service, to have a gloomy face or a chilling look.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: I try to give to the poor people for love what the rich could get for money. No, I wouldn't touch a leper for a thousand pounds; yet I willingly cure him for the love of God.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Rebellion against tyrants is obedience to God.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Prayer doesn't just change things - it changes us. If we are diligent in seeking God, slowly and surely we become better people.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: If you are caught on a golf course during a storm and are afraid of lightning, hold up a 1-iron. Not even God can hit a 1-iron.
author: Lee Trevino

quote: Being out there in the ocean, God's creation, it's like a gift He has given us to enjoy.
author: Bethany Hamilton

quote: Salvation brings the soul a deep awareness of God's love. Life takes on more meaning, for it now has a purpose.
author: Mother Angelica

quote: Man gives you the award but God gives you the reward.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: We live in a culture that relishes tearing others down. It's ultimately more fulfilling, though, to help people reach their goals. Instead of feeling jealous, remember: If God did it for them, He can do it for you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: God, give us grace to accept with serenity the things that cannot be changed, courage to change the things which should be changed and the wisdom to distinguish the one from the other.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your might. And these words that I command you today shall be on your heart. You shall teach them diligently to your children, and shall talk of them when you sit in your house, and when you walk by the way, and when you lie down, and when you rise.
author: Moses

quote: Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, I will come in to him and eat with him, and he with me.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Everything I did, all my actions, all of the problems I had I dedicate to God and to Chile, because I kept Chile from becoming Communist.
author: Augusto Pinochet

quote: You learn from the things that happen in your career. You get up and down. You never give up. All the things that happened in my career, thank God it happened early rather than late in my career.
author: Pablo Sandoval

quote: Let us more and more insist on raising funds of love, of kindness, of understanding, of peace. Money will come if we seek first the Kingdom of God - the rest will be given.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: God can cause opportunity to find you. He has unexpected blessings where you suddenly meet the right person, or suddenly your health improves, or suddenly you're able to pay off your house. That's God shifting things in your favor.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: God put us here to prepare this place for the next generation. That's our job. Raising children and helping the community, that's preparing for the next generation.
author: Dikembe Mutombo

quote: I don't know. Only God knows where the story ends for me, but I know where the story begins. It's up to us to choose, whether we win or lose and I choose to win.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: The message is that I was reminding myself and informing others of the fact that God has always been good to me. No matter what you're going through, God is always with us. Life is a journey.
author: Andrae Crouch

quote: Good man! Genuine gentleman! God bless George Thompson, the great-hearted friend of my race.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: Me don't dip on nobody's side. Me don't dip on the black man's side, not the white man's side. Me dip on God's side, the one who create me and cause me to come from black and white.
author: Bob Marley

quote: We are all gifted, but we have to discover the gift, uncover the gift, nurture and develop the gift and use it for the Glory of God and for the liberation struggle of our people.
author: Louis Farrakhan

quote: I am inclined to believe that this is the land God gave to Cain.
author: Jacques Cartier

quote: The eye with which I see God is the same eye with which God sees me.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Charity is a supreme virtue, and the great channel through which the mercy of God is passed onto mankind.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: May God save the country, for it is evident that the people will not.
author: Millard Fillmore

quote: God can be realized through all paths. All religions are true. The important thing is to reach the roof. You can reach it by stone stairs or by wooden stairs or by bamboo steps or by a rope. You can also climb up by a bamboo pole.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: From my point of view, God is the light that illuminates the darkness, even if it does not dissolve it, and a spark of divine light is within each of us.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Find new ways to spread the word of God to every corner of the world.
author: Pope Francis

quote: As a surgeon you have to have a controlled arrogance. If it's uncontrolled, you kill people, but you have to be pretty arrogant to saw through a person's chest, take out their heart and believe you can fix it. Then, when you succeed and the patient survives, you pray, because it's only by the grace of God that you get there.
author: Mehmet Oz

quote: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: As God has not made anything useless in this world, as all beings fulfill obligations or a role in the sublime drama of Creation, I cannot exempt from this duty, and small though it be, I too have a mission to fill, as for example: alleviating the sufferings of my fellowmen.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: When God sneezed, I didn't know what to say.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: The straight line belongs to men, the curved one to God.
author: Antoni Gaudi

quote: Find out how much God has given you and from it take what you need the remainder is needed by others.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Being a singer is a natural gift. It means I'm using to the highest degree possible the gift that God gave me to use. I'm happy with that.
author: Aretha Franklin

quote: Every day, I get closer to God. Every day, my will to do the right thing gets stronger.
author: DMX

quote: If God listened to the prayers of men, all men would quickly have perished: for they are forever praying for evil against one another.
author: Epicurus

quote: Since God had commanded it, it was necessary that I do it. Since God commanded it, even if I had a hundred fathers and mothers, even if I had been a King's daughter, I would have gone nevertheless.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: Material possessions, winning scores, and great reputations are meaningless in the eyes of the Lord, because He knows what we really are and that is all that matters.
author: John Wooden

quote: God doesn't dwell in the wooden, stony or earthen idols. His abode is in our feelings, our thoughts.
author: Chanakya

quote: The voice of the people has been said to be the voice of God; and, however generally this maxim has been quoted and believed, it is not true to fact. The people are turbulent and changing, they seldom judge or determine right.
author: Alexander Hamilton

quote: What God intended for you goes far beyond anything you can imagine.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: God may be in the details, but the goddess is in the questions. Once we begin to ask them, there's no turning back.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: An angel of God never has wings.
author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

quote: Give me one hundred preachers who fear nothing but sin and desire nothing but God, and I care not whether they be clergymen or laymen, they alone will shake the gates of Hell and set up the kingdom of Heaven upon Earth.
author: John Wesley

quote: God has given us two hands - one to receive with and the other to give with. We are not cisterns made for hoarding we are channels made for sharing.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Surely God would not have created such a being as man, with an ability to grasp the infinite, to exist only for a day! No, no, man was made for immortality.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If God wanted us to be naked, why did he invent sexy lingerie?
author: Shannen Doherty

quote: The Puritans' sense of priorities in life was one of their greatest strengths. Putting God first and valuing everything else in relation to God was a recurrent Puritan theme.
author: Leland Ryken

quote: Every day is a gift from God. Learn to focus on the Giver and enjoy the gift!
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: You desire that which exceeds my humble powers, but I trust in the compassion and mercy of the All-powerful God.
author: Saint Stephen

quote: The custom of speaking to God Almighty as freely as with a slave - caring nothing whether the words are suitable or not, but simply saying the first thing that comes to mind from being learnt by rote by frequent repetition - cannot be called prayer: God grant that no Christian may address Him in this manner.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: The will is a beast of burden. If God mounts it, it wishes and goes as God wills; if Satan mounts it, it wishes and goes as Satan wills; Nor can it choose its rider... the riders contend for its possession.
author: Martin Luther

quote: It is up to God to take revenge. Only God can judge. I don't have to worry about getting even with anybody or taking out any kind of aggression on anybody. Doing that is a weakness, anyway.
author: Jim Brown

quote: We are all different, but when we ask for the Lord's blessings, we must not forget that God created us equal.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: The world has changed and it's going to keep changing, but God never changes; so we are safe when we cling to Him.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: I was not popular in school, and I was definitely not a ladies' man. And I had a very painful adolescence, because it was all very strange to me. It wasn't like I got beat up, but the humiliation and isolation, and the existential 'God, I exist, and nobody cares' of being a teenager were extremely pronounced for me.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: As for reputation, though it be a glorious instrument of advancing our Master's service, yet there is a better than that: a clean heart, a single eye, and a soul full of God. A fair exchange if, by the loss of reputation, we can purchase the lowest degree of purity of heart.
author: John Wesley

quote: Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Jesus didn't say, 'Blessed are those who care for the poor.' He said, 'Blessed are we where we are poor, where we are broken.' It is there that God loves us deeply and pulls us into deeper communion with himself.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: If God wanted us to bend over he'd put diamonds on the floor.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Even during the worst hardships, when the other things in our lives seem to fall apart, we can still find peace in the eternal love of God.
author: Armstrong Williams

quote: The tendency to claim God as an ally for our partisan value and ends is the source of all religious fanaticism.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: People have to go through trials and tribulations to get where they at. Do your thing - continue to rock it - because obviously, God wants you here.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: Let us raise a standard to which the wise and honest can repair the rest is in the hands of God.
author: George Washington

quote: Only one thing is impossible for God: To find any sense in any copyright law on the planet.
author: Mark Twain

quote: In feature films the director is God in documentary films God is the director.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: Any decision I make is based on myself, and the only person I have to give an explanation to is God.
author: Solange Knowles

quote: Sometimes God will deliver you from the fire, and other times God will make you fireproof.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: The assurance of Heaven is never given to the person. And that's why at the core of the Christian faith is the grace of God. If there's one word I would grab from all of that, it's forgiveness - that you can be forgiven. I can be forgiven, and it is of the grace of God. But once you understand that, I think the ramifications are worldwide.
author: Ravi Zacharias

quote: The soul can split the sky in two and let the face of God shine through.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: God gives us our relatives, thank God we can choose our friends.
author: Ethel Watts Mumford

quote: Mankind must remember that peace is not God's gift to his creatures peace is our gift to each other.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Through prayer, fasting, and studying, God will answer.
author: Monica Johnson

quote: When you are spiritually connected, you are not looking for occasions to be offended, and you are not judging and labeling others. You are in a state of grace in which you know you are connected to God and thus free from the effects of anyone or anything external to yourself.
author: Wayne Dyer
