quote: The meaning of life. The wasted years of life. The poor choices of life. God answers the mess of life with one word: 'grace.'
author: Max Lucado

quote: Whenever I'm confused about something, I ask God to reveal the answers to my questions, and he does.
author: Beyonce Knowles

quote: It is by the goodness of God that in our country we have those three unspeakably precious things: freedom of speech, freedom of conscience, and the prudence never to practice either of them.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Little children, you are from God, and have conquered them; for the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in this world.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Is man one of God's blunders? Or is God one of man's blunders?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I believe in evolution. But I also believe, when I hike the Grand Canyon and see it at sunset, that the hand of God is there also.
author: John McCain

quote: Do not worship me, I am not God. I'm only a man. I worship Jesus Christ.
author: Haile Selassie

quote: Sometimes I do get to places just when God's ready to have somebody click the shutter.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: Our life of poverty is as necessary as the work itself. Only in heaven will we see how much we owe to the poor for helping us to love God better because of them.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I just thank God that I didn't grow up with so much money or privilege because you had to create ways to make it happen.
author: Kim Basinger

quote: Of the love or hatred God has for the English, I know nothing, but I do know that they will all be thrown out of France, except those who die there.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: To love someone means to see him as God intended him.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: God is, even though the whole world deny him. Truth stands, even if there be no public support. It is self-sustained.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: God meets daily needs daily. Not weekly or annually. He will give you what you need when it is needed.
author: Max Lucado

quote: Woman was God's second mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: It does me no injury for my neighbor to say there are twenty gods or no God.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A season of suffering is a small assignment when compared to the reward. Rather than begrudge your problem, explore it. Ponder it. And most of all, use it. Use it to the glory of God.
author: Max Lucado

quote: God exists since mathematics is consistent, and the Devil exists since we cannot prove it.
author: Andre Weil

quote: The artist is chosen by God to fulfill his commands and must never be overwhelmed by public opinion.
author: Albrecht Durer

quote: I pray to God that I shall not live one hour after I have thought of using deception.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: You know, God has a plan for me, and I'm going to follow in his footsteps and just rejoice and be happy.
author: Gabby Douglas

quote: Even Helen Keller, who was born blind and deaf, could see God. No doubt, in her silent darkness, every fragrant flower, every ray of the warm sun, every taste that touched her tongue told her that there was a God who created all things. Jodie Foster shouldn't therefore be surprised that people are surprised that she's an atheist.
author: Ray Comfort

quote: When you're young, you wonder what all these old people are droning on about, trying to impart their wisdom. It's not relevant to you because being young is such a specific thing. Thank God for that. Thank God for the young people who go out and demonstrate against rampant capitalism or whatever.
author: Helen Mirren

quote: I cannot think that we are useless or God would not have created us. There is one God looking down on us all. We are all the children of one God. The sun, the darkness, the winds are all listening to what we have to say.
author: Geronimo

quote: I am God's vessel. But my greatest pain in life is that I will never be able to see myself perform live.
author: Kanye West

quote: When you receive God's love and encouragement, it will empower you to do more than you ever thought possible.
author: Victoria Osteen

quote: Of all created comforts, God is the lender; you are the borrower, not the owner.
author: Ernest Rutherford

quote: We cannot, of course, disprove God, just as we can't disprove Thor, fairies, leprechauns and the Flying Spaghetti Monster.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: The knower and the known are one. Simple people imagine that they should see God as if he stood there and they here. This is not so. God and I, we are one in knowledge.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: I was in my thirteenth year when I heard a voice from God to help me govern my conduct. And the first time I was very much afraid.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: I used to read five psalms every day - that teaches me how to get along with God. Then I read a chapter of Proverbs every day and that teaches me how to get along with my fellow man.
author: Billy Graham

quote: If the Lord says to give more than you think you are able to give, know that He will provide for you. Whether things are sailing smoothly or the bottom has dropped out, He is always trustworthy. You can count on Almighty God to keep His everlasting Word.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: You know, God gave me a gift to do other things besides play the game of basketball.
author: LeBron James

quote: I shall never believe that God plays dice with the world.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: God moves in a mysterious way, His wonders to perform. He plants his footsteps in the sea, and rides upon the storm.
author: William Cowper

quote: Start living now. Stop saving the good china for that special occasion. Stop withholding your love until that special person materializes. Every day you are alive is a special occasion. Every minute, every breath, is a gift from God.
author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quote: Not only does God play dice, but... he sometimes throws them where they cannot be seen.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: The reproduction of mankind is a great marvel and mystery. Had God consulted me in the matter, I should have advised him to continue the generation of the species by fashioning them out of clay.
author: Martin Luther

quote: But God can only smile because only God can know what is coming next.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: You can either be a host to God, or a hostage to your ego. It's your call.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: I distrust those people who know so well what God wants them to do, because I notice it always coincides with their own desires.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: For Christians, who believe they are created in the image of God, it is the Godhead, diversity in unity and the three-in-oneness of God, which we and all creation reflect.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: The question of whether or not there is a God or truth or reality or whatever you like to call it, can never be answered by books, by priests, philosopher's or saviours. Nobody and nothing can answer the question but you yourself, and that is why you must know yourself - Immaturity lies only in total ignorance of self.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: From a religious point of view, if God had thought homosexuality is a sin, he would not have created gay people.
author: Howard Dean

quote: I have enough love to last me a lifetime! Thank God I'll never lose my imagination and my passion. That's really what it is. I'm still passionate about what I do.
author: Teena Marie

quote: Great thoughts and a pure heart, that is what we should ask from God.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I don't happen to approve of plastic surgery. I think God put plastic surgeons on this earth for good reasons - people get burned or people might have a nose like Pinocchio and that has to be fixed. But to just chop yourself up to look a few years younger? You could come out looking like a Picasso picture.
author: Iris Apfel

quote: I say to mankind, Be not curious about God. For I, who am curious about each, am not curious about God - I hear and behold God in every object, yet understand God not in the least.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Men always talk about the most important things to perfect strangers. In the perfect stranger we perceive man himself the image of a God is not disguised by resemblances to an uncle or doubts of wisdom of a mustache.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: I am a poor man and of little worth, who is laboring in that art that God has given me in order to extend my life as long as possible.
author: Michelangelo

quote: When I see children, I see the face of God. That's why I love them so much. That's what I see.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: The Communist vision is the vision of man without God.
author: Whittaker Chambers

quote: God lends a helping hand to the man who tries hard.
author: Aeschylus

quote: I want to challenge you today to get out of your comfort zone. You have so much incredible potential on the inside. God has put gifts and talents in you that you probably don't know anything about.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: The First Amendment to the Constitution reflects that concept recognized in the Ten Commandments, that the duties we owe to God and the manner of discharging those duties are outside the purview of government.
author: Roy Moore

quote: The most important thing for me is having a relationship with God. To know that the owner, the creator of the universe loves you, sent His Son to die for your sins; that's very empowering. Knowing Him and knowing that He loves me gives me encouragement and confidence to move forward.
author: Ben Carson

quote: The style of God venerated in the church, mosque, or synagogue seems completely different from the style of the natural universe.
author: Alan Watts

quote: I'm a survivor of life. I try to give the glory to God and appreciate what's happening to me.
author: Mike Epps

quote: The question is what I wanted to do with the new life God has given me. This is the mission I want to take on.
author: Billy Tauzin

quote: There is greatness in the fear of God, contentment in faith of God, and honour in humility.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: If you believe in God, He will open the windows of heaven and pour blessings upon you.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: The end of life is to be like God, and the soul following God will be like Him.
author: Socrates

quote: We cannot know the whole truth, which belongs to God alone, but our task nevertheless is to seek to know what is true. And if we offend gravely enough against what we know to be true, as by failing badly enough to deal affectionately and responsibly with our land and our neighbors, truth will retaliate with ugliness, poverty, and disease.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: What I absolutely want is to suggest that before it's anything else, redemption is God mending the bicycle of our souls; God bringing out the puncture repair kit, re-inflating the tires, taking off the rust, making us roadworthy once more. Not so that we can take flight into ecstasy, but so that we can do the next needful mile of our lives.
author: Francis Spufford

quote: There cannot be a God because if there were one, I could not believe that I was not He.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If I truly believe everything that's in that book, God is in control. He is in control. He's working for my good. Doesn't mean everything's going to be smooth, but that's all I needed to know. There is a light at the end of the tunnel.
author: Shawn Michaels

quote: Everything we do should be a result of our gratitude for what God has done for us.
author: Lauryn Hill

quote: Risk is a part of God's game, alike for men and nations.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Today I am the happiest man in the world, my son was born and thanks to God for this gift.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: God gives us life and takes us away as He sees fit.
author: Johnny Cash

quote: If you don't take a Sabbath, something is wrong. You're doing too much, you're being too much in charge. You've got to quit, one day a week, and just watch what God is doing when you're not doing anything.
author: Eugene H. Peterson

quote: I don't stand for the black man's side, I don' t stand for the white man's side. I stand for God's side.
author: Bob Marley

quote: I am still far from being what I want to be, but with God's help I shall succeed.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: God is cruel. Sometimes he makes you live.
author: Stephen King

quote: More are the names of God and infinite are the forms through which He may be approached. In whatever name and form you worship Him, through them you will realise Him.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Our society strives to avoid any possibility of offending anyone - except God.
author: Billy Graham

quote: We Americans have no commission from God to police the world.
author: Benjamin Harrison

quote: God Almighty first planted a garden. And indeed, it is the purest of human pleasures.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: My strong belief is that God created human beings and therefore he knows about every aspect of the human body. So if I want to fix it, I just need to stay in harmony with Him.
author: Ben Carson

quote: I'm a man of faith. I only fear God, and my wife - sometimes.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: God does not play dice.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: God is best known in not knowing him.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: God wants my life to be about being successful and being happy and blessing other people and being blessed.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: I have a fundamental belief in the Bible as the Word of God, written by those who were inspired. I study the Bible daily.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Regret is not a proactive feeling. It is situated in disappointment, sorrow, even remorse. It merely wishes things were different without an act to cause a difference. However, repentance is different. Repentance is an admission of, hatred of, and turning away from sin before God.
author: Monica Johnson

quote: I like smoking! I mean, God, I quit everything else, can't I smoke?
author: Melanie Griffith

quote: The divine light which you carry within your soul is inherited from God because you are His daughter. Part of the light which makes you so magnificent is the blessing of womanhood.
author: Margaret D. Nadauld

quote: There is nothing that wastes the body like worry, and one who has any faith in God should be ashamed to worry about anything whatsoever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: When you focus on how wonderful God is and all the great things He's done... is doing... and even will do in your life, your natural response will be praise, adoration and awe. Don't let yourself ever get used to it... stay amazed!
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: If you can believe in God, then you can believe in anything. It's a gang mentality.
author: Greg Graffin

quote: I am and always will be a sinner. But that's the beautiful thing about Jesus. I'll always try to be a better person in the eyes of God. But I'm not all of a sudden stepping up on a pedestal and saying I'm holier than thou, 'cause I'm not!
author: Billy Ray Cyrus

quote: After many years of great mercy, after tasting of the powers of the world to come, we still are so weak, so foolish; but, oh! when we get away from self to God, there all is truth and purity and holiness, and our heart finds peace, wisdom, completeness, delight, joy, victory.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: God is a comedian, playing to an audience too afraid to laugh.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: If only God would give me some clear sign! Like making a large deposit in my name at a Swiss bank.
author: Woody Allen

quote: If you want to be original just try being yourself, because God has never made two people exactly alike.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: The wrath of God is a way of saying that I have been living in a way that is contrary to the love that is God. Anyone who begins to live and grow away from God, who lives away from what is good, is turning his life toward wrath.
author: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: God who is eternally complete, who directs the stars, who is the master of fates, who elevates man from his lowliness to Himself, who speaks from the cosmos to every single human soul, is the most brilliant manifestation of the goal of perfection.
author: Alfred Adler

quote: Human beings should be held accountable. Leave God alone. He has enough problems.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: While I know myself as a creation of God, I am also obligated to realize and remember that everyone else and everything else are also God's creation.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The blame is his who chooses: God is blameless.
author: Plato

quote: I found thee not, O Lord, without, because I erred in seeking thee without that wert within.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Where mercy, love, and pity dwell, there God is dwelling too.
author: William Blake

quote: When trouble comes, focus on God's ability to care for you.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I've learned over the years to appreciate God's timing, and you can't rush things; it's gonna happen exactly when it's supposed to.
author: Sevyn Streeter

quote: It is the experiences, the great triumphant joy of living to the fullest extent in which real meaning is found. God it's great to be alive!
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: Life as we know it, with all its ups and downs, will soon be over. We all will give an accounting to God of how we have lived.
author: William Wilberforce

quote: If there is no God, everything is permitted.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: God will never direct us to be prideful, arrogant and unforgiving, immoral or slothful or full of fear. We step into these things because we are insensitive to the leadership of the Holy Spirit within us.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: We should never desire to be over others. Instead, we ought to be servants who are submissive to every human being for God's sake.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Whatever I will become will be what God has chosen for me.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: Thank God for the journey.
author: James Brown

quote: The man who sows wrong thoughts and deeds and prays that God will bless him is in the position of a farmer who, having sown tares, asks God to bring forth for him a harvest of wheat.
author: James Allen

quote: A 'real pastor' is not preaching of their own; they are speaking what God put in their heart by the Holy Spirit. The Holy Spirit is using them at that very moment to speak to the congregations situations -past, present, and future.
author: Monica Johnson

quote: The fact that what we believe about marriage - that it should be between a man and a woman - and that we're pro-life, somehow that becomes radical? Why is that? It's because our culture has changed. But the truth is, culture may change, people change, but the Word of God never changes, and that's what we rest our belief system on.
author: Robert Jeffress

quote: If I were to say, 'God, why me?' about the bad things, then I should have said, 'God, why me?' about the good things that happened in my life.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: If God wanted us to fly, He would have given us tickets.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: Sin does not stop God's grace from flowing, but God's grace will stop sin.
author: Joseph Prince

quote: If it came to a magic genie, I would ask him for two extra wishes. One would be that no one would have to live with the muscular dystrophy disease or any disease. And the second one would be world peace, that we just stop fighting, talk about things, and we could live in harmony once again, like God intended us to do.
author: Mattie Stepanek

quote: As a Christian, I know my life is in God's hands. He has a plan for me. Therefore, I never worry about tomorrow or never worry about winning or losing football games. That knowledge gives me a lot of composure in tough situations.
author: Tom Landry

quote: I have not lost faith in God. I have moments of anger and protest. Sometimes I've been closer to him for that reason.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Thank God I'm an atheist.
author: Luis Bunuel

quote: Every perfect life is a parable invented by God.
author: Simone Weil

quote: My name is Linus, and I am your God.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: It can have a secular purpose and have a relationship to God because God was presumed to be both over the state and the church, and separation of church and state was never meant to separate God from government.
author: Roy Moore

quote: The religious idea of God cannot do full duty for the metaphysical infinity.
author: Alan Watts

quote: As different streams having different sources all mingle their waters in the sea, so different tendencies, various though they appear, crooked or straight, all lead to God.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: I am at peace with God. My conflict is with Man.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Destiny is not designed by mere mortals like us. It is crafted by God.
author: Rodrigo Duterte

quote: God enters by a private door into every individual.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: God bless Africa, Guard her people, Guide her leaders, And give her peace.
author: Trevor Huddleston

quote: To go to heaven, fully to enjoy God, is infinitely better than the most pleasant accommodations here.
author: Jonathan Edwards

quote: To light one candle to God and another to the Devil is the principle of wisdom.
author: Jose Bergamin

quote: I like people and I like them to like me, but I wear my heart where God put it, on the inside.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: As you walk in God's divine wisdom, you will surely begin to see a greater measure of victory and good success in your life.
author: Joseph Prince

quote: The God of the Hebrews is a God that human language, we're not even supposed to speak the holy name. We were told in the Second Commandment we could make no images of this God, and I don't think that means just building idols, I think that means also trying to believe you've captured God in your words, in the Creeds, in the Scriptures.
author: John Shelby Spong

quote: In the Lord's Prayer, the first petition is for daily bread. No one can worship God or love his neighbor on an empty stomach.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Sorrow for sin is indeed necessary, but it should not be an endless preoccupation. You must dwell also on the glad remembrance of God's loving-kindness; otherwise, sadness will harden the heart and lead it more deeply into despair.
author: Saint Bernard

quote: Because I believe in God and have faith in God, it doesn't mean I am immortal. It doesn't mean I am immune, as has been claimed. I am as scared as anyone of getting hurt, especially driving a Formula One car.
author: Ayrton Senna

quote: If you hug to yourself any resentment against anybody else, you destroy the bridge by which God would come to you.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: Laughter is God's blessing.
author: Joseph Prince

quote: There is one God, and He made both Indians and white men. We were all made out of the dust of the earth.
author: Standing Bear

quote: I just want to do God's will. And he's allowed me to go to the mountain. And I've looked over, and I've seen the promised land! I may not get there with you, but I want you to know tonight that we as a people will get to the promised land.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: If I am capable of grasping God objectively, I do not believe, but precisely because I cannot do this I must believe.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Marriage has made me a lot happier and I'm deeply in love with my wife, and I thank God for her every day.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: God does not change; he is Love, ever and always. In himself, he is communion, unity in Trinity, and all his words and works are directed to communion.
author: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: I have sworn upon the altar of God, eternal hostility against every form of tyranny over the mind of man.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The essence of Hinduism is the same essence of all true religions: Bhakti or pure love for God and genuine compassion for all beings.
author: Radhanath Swami

quote: God is a verb, not a noun.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Knowledge of God's Word is a bulwark against deception, temptation, accusation, even persecution.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: God always strives together with those who strive.
author: Aeschylus

quote: And God said, 'Let there be light' and there was light, but the Electricity Board said He would have to wait until Thursday to be connected.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: There's too much tendency to attribute to God the evils that man does of his own free will.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: But at any rate, the point is that God is what nobody admits to being, and everybody really is.
author: Alan Watts

quote: God, life changes faster than you think.
author: Amy Tan

quote: I'm an atheist and I thank God for it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The limitless loving devotion to God, and the gift God makes of Himself to you, are the highest elevation of which the heart is capable; it is the highest degree of prayer. The souls that have reached this point are truly the heart of the Church.
author: Edith Stein

quote: I am convinced that God wanted me to be a baseball player.
author: Roberto Clemente

quote: Whatsoever is, is in God, and without God nothing can be, or be conceived.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Our national motto is 'In God we Trust,' reminding us that faith in our Creator is the most important American value of all.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: The Gospel is about grace and we all know that grace is about us receiving from God blessings that we don't deserve.
author: Tony Campolo

quote: Any fool knows that bravado is always a cover-up for insecurity. That's the truth. And on that note, I'll say goodnight. God love you.
author: Bobby Darin

quote: There's only one effectively redemptive sacrifice, the sacrifice of self-will to make room for the knowledge of God.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: God is the tangential point between zero and infinity.
author: Alfred Jarry

quote: It may be that our role on this planet is not to worship God - but to create him.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: God, I can push the grass apart and lay my finger on Thy heart.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: God has entrusted me with myself.
author: Epictetus

quote: God hangs the greatest weights upon the smallest wires.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: One and God make a majority.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: Nobody talks so constantly about God as those who insist that there is no God.
author: Heywood Broun

quote: Life is God's novel. Let him write it.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: God is an unutterable sigh, planted in the depths of the soul.
author: Jean Paul

quote: It is only the impossible that is possible for God. He has given over the possible to the mechanics of matter and the autonomy of his creatures.
author: Simone Weil

quote: God gets you to the plate, but once your there your on your own.
author: Ted Williams

quote: In almost everything that touches our everyday life on earth, God is pleased when we're pleased. He wills that we be as free as birds to soar and sing our maker's praise without anxiety.
author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quote: God's truth judges created things out of love, and Satan's truth judges them out of envy and hatred.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: However many blessings we expect from God, His infinite liberality will always exceed all our wishes and our thoughts.
author: John Calvin

quote: There is no work, however vile or sordid, that does not glisten before God.
author: John Calvin

quote: Trust in God - she will provide.
author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quote: Even God lends a hand to honest boldness.
author: Menander

quote: God is looking for people to use, and if you can get usable, he will wear you out. The most dangerous prayer you can pray is this: 'Use me.'
author: Rick Warren

quote: The way to be with God in every season is to strive to be near Him every week and each day.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: We should always look upon ourselves as God's servants, placed in God's world, to do his work; and accordingly labour faithfully for him; not with a design to grow rich and great, but to glorify God, and do all the good we possibly can.
author: David Brainerd

quote: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Great and glorious God, and Thou Lord Jesus, I pray you shed abroad your light in the darkness of my mind. Be found of me, Lord, so that in all things I may act only in accordance with Thy holy will.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: To doubt God is to doubt one's own conscience, and in consequence, it would be to doubt everything; and then what is life for?
author: Jose Rizal

quote: God put the human race in charge of managing the resources of the entire planet for the benefit of all life. Therefore, we, of all people on this planet, should be concerned about environmental issues and doing what we can to enhance the beauty and productivity of the natural realm.
author: Hugh Ross

quote: We say keep your change, we'll keep our God, our guns, our constitution.
author: Sarah Palin

quote: Like the old soldier of the ballad, I now close my military career and just fade away, an old soldier who tried to do his duty as God gave him the light to see that duty. Goodbye.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: You never know God is all you need until God is all you have.
author: Rick Warren

quote: God made and governs the world invisibly, and has commanded us to love and worship him and no other God; to honor our parents and masters, and love our neighbours as ourselves; and to be temperate, just, and peaceable, and to be merciful even to brute beasts.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: I have never made but one prayer to God, a very short one: 'O Lord make my enemies ridiculous.' And God granted it.
author: Voltaire

quote: Fix reason firmly in her seat, and call to her tribunal every fact, every opinion. Question with boldness even the existence of a God; because, if there be one, he must more approve of the homage of reason, than that of blindfolded fear.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: No man ever did, nor ever shall, truly go forth to convert the nations, nor to prophesy in the present state of witnesses against Antichrist, but by the gracious inspiration and instigation of the Holy Spirit of God.
author: Roger Williams

quote: We cannot suppose therefore that God has made an order of beings, with such mental qualities and powers, for the sole purpose of being used as beasts, or instruments of labour.
author: Thomas Clarkson

quote: But separation of church and state was never meant to separate God and government.
author: Roy Moore

quote: To do all that one is able to do, is to be a man; to do all that one would like to do, is to be a god.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The key to winning is choosing to do God's will and loving others with all you've got.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Here's the reality. The image of a white Jesus has been used to justify enslavement, conquest, colonialism, the genocide of indigenous peoples. There are literally millions of human beings whose lives have been snuffed out by people who conquered under the banner of a white god.
author: Tim Wise

quote: Sense perceptions can be and often are false and deceptive, however real they may appear to us. Where there is realization outside the senses, it is infallible. It is proved not by extraneous evidence but in the transformed conduct and character of those who have felt the real presence of God within.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: People who cease to believe in God or goodness altogether still believe in the devil. I don't know why. No, I do indeed know why. Evil is always possible. And goodness is eternally difficult.
author: Anne Rice

quote: But suppose God is black? What if we go to Heaven and we, all our lives, have treated the Negro as an inferior, and God is there, and we look up and He is not white? What then is our response?
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: God gave me a great body and it's my duty to take care of my physical temple.
author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quote: I'm gonna be blunt and plain, if one ever looks at me like that I'm gonna kill him and tell God he died.
author: Jimmy Swaggart

quote: No enactment of man can be considered law unless it conforms to the law of God.
author: William Blackstone

quote: The main rule to me is to honor God with your life. To life a life of integrity. Not be selfish. You know, help others. But that's really the essence of the Christian faith.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: May God protect me from gloomy saints.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Only the supernatural love of God through changed lives can solve the problems that we face in our world.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Man is important in one sense only. He was made in the image of God: That is his importance. He is not important for his body, ego, or personality. His constant affirmation of ego-consciousness is the source of all his problems.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: We are not sent into this world mainly to enjoy the loveliness therein, nor to sit us down in passive ease; no, we were sent here for action. The soul that seeks to do the will of God with a pure heart, fervently, does not yield to the lethargy of ease.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: God made man to go by motives, and he will not go without them, any more than a boat without steam or a balloon without gas.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Law and equity are two things which God has joined, but which man has put asunder.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: I do not want to foresee the future. I am concerned with taking care of the present. God has given me no control over the moment following.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You're just left with yourself all the time, whatever you do anyway. You've got to get down to your own God in your own temple. It's all down to you, mate.
author: John Lennon

quote: When we believe that God is Father, we also believe that such a father's hand will never cause his child a needless tear. We may not understand life any better, but we will not resent life any longer.
author: William Barclay

quote: The Church is the new creation, it is life and joy, it is the sacramental fellowship in which we share the ultimate purpose of God, made real for us now in our hearing the Word and sharing the Sacrament.
author: Rowan Williams

quote: Anytime you deny the acknowledgement of God you are undermining the entire basis for which our country exists.
author: Roy Moore

quote: This is why the ultimate reason of things must lie in a necessary substance, in which the differentiation of the changes only exists eminently as in their source; and this is what we call God.
author: Gottfried Leibniz

quote: The all-seeing eye of God beheld our deplorable state infinite pity touched the heart of the Father of mercies and infinite wisdom laid the plan of our recovery.
author: David Brainerd

quote: Order is manifestly maintained in the universe... governed by the sovereign will of God.
author: James Prescott Joule

quote: For God's sake hold your tongue, and let me love.
author: John Donne

quote: I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Earth's crammed with heaven, And every common bush afire with God: But only he who sees takes off his shoes.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: God does not begin by asking our ability, only our availability, and if we prove our dependability, He will increase our capability.
author: Neal A. Maxwell

quote: If God only used perfect people, nothing would get done. God will use anybody if you're available.
author: Rick Warren

quote: Thank God for acupuncture. It's been around for 2000 years. It's not going anyplace and people use it all of the time for a variety of cures and to avoid illnesses.
author: Tim Daly

quote: The only answer to fear is faith in God, knowing He loves you unconditionally and individually.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: The Christian leader of the future is called to be completely irrelevant and to stand in this world with nothing to offer but his or her own vulnerable self. God loves us, not because of what we do or accomplish, but because God has created and redeemed us in love.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Each of you is a unique child of God. God knows you individually. He sends messages of encouragement, correction, and direction fitted to you and to your needs.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: My mother always used to say, 'Well, if you had been born a little girl growing up in Egypt, you would go to church or go to worship Allah, but surely if those people are worshipping a God, it must be the same God' - that's what she always said. The same God with different names.
author: Jane Goodall

quote: There is no uncreated being except God. God has no opposite.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Let God's grace be the mosque, and devotion the prayer mat. Let the Quran be the good conduct.
author: Guru Nanak

quote: There are worlds and more worlds below them, and there are a hundred thousand skies over them. No one has been able to find the limits and boundaries of God. If there be any account of God, then alone the mortal can write the same; but God's account does not finish, and the mortal himself dies while still writing.
author: Guru Nanak

quote: I wish that the Indians believed me a god, for upon the report of an enemy's valor oftentimes depends the success of a battle, and false reports have many times done as great things as true courage and resolution.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: Those who persevere in sin are those who are held in abhorrence by God, but those who abandon the ways of sin are loved by the Lord.
author: St. Jerome

quote: He who is unable to live in society, or who has no need because he is sufficient for himself, must be either a beast or a god.
author: Aristotle

quote: God does not die on the day when we cease to believe in a personal deity, but we die on the day when our lives cease to be illumined by the steady radiance, renewed daily, of a wonder, the source of which is beyond all reason.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: When I judge art, I take my painting and put it next to a God made object like a tree or flower. If it clashes, it is not art.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: God's finger touched him, and he slept.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: God grants liberty only to those who love it, and are always ready to guard and defend it.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: Apply yourself. Get all the education you can, but then, by God, do something. Don't just stand there, make it happen.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: Men judge us by the success of our efforts. God looks at the efforts themselves.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: I consider myself very lucky. God has a funny way of bringing some things around and knocking you in the head with the ultimate destination. Something I should have achieved quite easily took me a long time to get around to. It came in His time, not mine.
author: Jim Morris

quote: God has been very good to me, for I never dwell upon anything wrong which a person has done, so as to remember it afterwards. If I do remember it, I always see some other virtue in that person.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: I have learned that to have a good friend is the purest of all God's gifts, for it is a love that has no exchange of payment.
author: Frances Farmer

quote: It is clear that he does not pray, who, far from uplifting himself to God, requires that God shall lower Himself to him, and who resorts to prayer not to stir the man in us to will what God wills, but only to persuade God to will what the man in us wills.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: God is not a dead equation!
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: God is in all men, but all men are not in God; that is why we suffer.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: You and I are but specks of that rhythmic urge which is Brahma, which is Allah, which is God.
author: Ruth St. Denis

quote: God wants us to prosper financially, to have plenty of money, to fulfill the destiny He has laid out for us.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I always had a desire to know asylum life more thoroughly - a desire to be convinced that the most helpless of God's creatures, the insane, were cared for kindly and properly.
author: Nellie Bly

quote: When I was doing theater, I was very successful at believing that I was great, God's gift to the theater.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear.
author: Ayrton Senna

quote: The highest revelation is that God is in every man.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Man is to man either a god or a wolf.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: God doesn't seek for golden vessels, and does not ask for silver ones, but He must have clean ones.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: The highest reward that God gives us for good work is the ability to do better work.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: A singer starts by having his instrument as a gift from God... When you have been given something in a moment of grace, it is sacrilegious to be greedy.
author: Marian Anderson

quote: Two days after moving we recommended ourselves to God, Our Lord, and fled, hoping that, although it was late in the season and the fruits of the tunas were giving out, by remaining in the field we might still get over a good portion of the land.
author: Alvar N. C. de Vaca

quote: Jail didn't make me find God, He's always been there. They can lock me up, but my spirit and my love can never be confined to prison walls.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: Basically, there are two paths you can walk: faith or fear. It's impossible to simultaneously trust God and not trust God.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: Now the only way you can serve God on earth is by serving others.
author: Rick Warren

quote: God has never made a mistake. Ever.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: God's forgiveness allows us to be honest with ourselves. We recognize our imperfections, admit our failures, and plead to God for clemency.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Have you ever struggled to find work or love, only to find them after you have given up? This is the paradox of letting go. Let go, in order to achieve. Letting go is God's law.
author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quote: It's not about being thin, it's about being healthy. And when you are a child you like to eat all these unhealthy things like chocolate and sweets. Oh my God. I love strawberries dipped in chocolate and Lion bars and Toffee Crisps - and as you grow up, you have to learn that those things are only good in moderation or you will become very fat.
author: Dionne Bromfield

quote: The tragedy of life and of the world is not that men do not know God; the tragedy is that, knowing Him, they still insist on going their own way.
author: William Barclay

quote: Do not compare yourself. Find out what God has placed in your ability.
author: Emmitt Smith

quote: When I took the habit, the Lord immediately showed me how He favours those who do violence to themselves in order to serve Him. No one saw what I endured... At the moment of my entrance into this new state I felt a joy so great that it has never failed me even to this day; and God converted the dryness of my soul into a very great tenderness.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: I am blessed to receive a word from God every day in receiving the scriptures and reading the scriptures. And God speaks through the Bible.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in Him.
author: John Piper

quote: The word 'God' usually signifies 'Lord', but every lord is not a God. It is the dominion of a spiritual being which constitutes a God: a true, supreme, or imaginary dominion makes a true, supreme, or imaginary God.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: I do not believe that God has created us under this dire necessity to toil, like beasts, to sustain life. I believe it is his will that we should hold absolute mastery over time, so as to devote it mainly to intellectual and moral improvement, domestic enjoyment, and social intercourse.
author: William Lloyd Garrison

quote: There are two kinds of people one can call reasonable: those who serve God with all their heart because they know him, and those who seek him with all their heart because they do not know him.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: God doesn't want us to have rigid rituals with Him. In the new covenant, He is more interested in having a relationship with us.
author: Joseph Prince

quote: God expects but one thing of you, and that is that you should come out of yourself in so far as you are a created being made and let God be God in you.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: With all the media attention, all the love from the fans, I felt I needed to prove myself. Prove that I'm not a marketing tool, I'm not a ploy to improve attendance. Prove I can play in this league. But I've surrendered that to God. I'm not in a battle with what everybody else thinks anymore.
author: Jeremy Lin

quote: It is easy for Christians to have the false impression that once we have established a relationship with Christ, which we believe sets us right with God, the problems of life will somehow scoot away or they will slowly be removed from our lives.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Every creature is a word of God.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: The grace of God is dangerous. It's lavish, excessive, outrageous, and scandalous. God's grace is ridiculously inclusive. Apparently God doesn't care who He loves. He is not very careful about the people He calls His friends or the people He calls His Church.
author: Mike Yaconelli

quote: Conscience is the authentic voice of God to you.
author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quote: God knows I detest slavery but it is an existing evil, and we must endure it and give it such protection as is guaranteed by the Constitution.
author: Millard Fillmore

quote: I'm always happy for people when I see God blessing them the way he's blessed me.
author: Ruben Studdard

quote: Men must be governed by God or they will be ruled by tyrants.
author: William Penn

quote: The feeling of longing for home is born into us. That wonderful dream cannot become real without great faith - enough for the Holy Ghost to lead us to repentance, baptism, and the making and keeping of sacred covenants with God. This faith requires enduring bravely the trials of mortal life.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: The Eucharistic mystery stands at the heart and center of the liturgy since it is the fount of life by which we are cleansed and strengthened to live not for ourselves but for God and to be united in love among ourselves.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: But this will not do, God will certainly punish you for stealing and for being unfaithful.
author: Jupiter Hammon

quote: I'm black because I was born this way. I'm proud of it. Thank God I am who I am.
author: Darius Rucker

quote: Not only is there no God, but try finding a plumber on Sunday.
author: Woody Allen

quote: The wonderful news is that our Lord is a God of mercy, and He responds to repentance.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Grow in the root of all grace, which is faith. Believe God's promises more firmly than ever. Allow your faith to increase in its fullness, firmness, and simplicity.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: You can only learn so much from books. You can only learn so much from education. Ultimately, it is the wisdom of God that will carry you through in the toughest situations of life.
author: Ravi Zacharias

quote: I wake up every day inspiring myself, because God gave me life.
author: DJ Khaled

quote: Your faithfulness makes you trustworthy to God.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Bitterness and unforgiveness block the flow of God's blessing in your life and actually hinder your prayers.
author: Victoria Osteen

quote: Man was created to praise, reverence, and serve God our Lord and in this way to save his soul. The other things on Earth were created for man's use, to help him reach the end for which he was created.
author: Saint Ignatius

quote: I like to go dancing, have a few beers. I like being alone, too. I have days where it's 'God, get me a shot of tequila.'
author: Justine Bateman

quote: It's a mystery. That's the first thing that interests me about the idea of God. If there is one, it's mysterious and powerful and awesome to even consider the concept, and you have to take it seriously.
author: Stephen King

quote: A faithful woman can become a devoted daughter of God - more concerned with being righteous than with being selfish, more anxious to exercise compassion than to exercise dominion, more committed to integrity than to notoriety. And she knows of her own infinite worth.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: God gave me a voice to sing with, and when you have that, what other gimmick is there?
author: Whitney Houston

quote: If you need me to tell you that if you serve God, you'll get a Mercedes, you're lost.
author: Paul Washer

quote: My mama told me in college, 'I love you, and you're God's child, but natural beauty will only take you so far.'
author: Robin Roberts

quote: I don't really know why I care so much. I just have something inside me that tells me that there is a problem, and I have got to do something about it. I think that is what I would call the God in me.
author: Wangari Maathai

quote: Ascetics and fakirs come to mitigate human suffering to heal us and lead us on the path. They put up with criticism they go through many worldly trials. Some of them have even become martyrs for our sake. But they have done all this with a smile and with gratitude to God. Hence sacrifice is a great virtue.
author: Sadhu Vaswani

quote: As we lay hold upon the truth of God, its influence must affect us. It must elevate us. It must remove from us every imperfection.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: It doesn't matter who likes you or doesn't like you, all that matters is that God likes you. He accepts you, he approves of you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: The sin which is indulged to the greatest extent, which separates us from God and produces so many spiritual disorders, and which are contagious, is selfishness.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: Whatsoever is done out of pure love, be it ever so little or contemptible in the sight of men, is wholly fruitful; for God measures more with how much love one worketh, than the amount he doeth.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: When your identity is found in Christ, your identity never changes. You are always a child of God.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: All God wants of man is a peaceful heart.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: As much as I loved the model of St. Francis, I realized that I couldn't afford to be poor, because unlike St. Francis, I'm not celibate. I was enlightened that God's call to me was not poverty but generosity and simplicity. And I had to go back to the lesson I learned from my parents: that is, simplicity.
author: Bo Sanchez

quote: The greatest legacy is that which benefits the widest number of people for the longest period without limit to value. No one but the Prophet Muhammad was given that role as the seal of God's message.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: He who desires to worship God must harbor no childish illusions about the matter but bravely renounce his liberty and humanity.
author: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: God is the most ancient of all things, for he had no birth.
author: Thales

quote: Other people - they practice and they practice... these fingers of mine, they got brains in 'em. You don't tell them what to do - they do it. God given talent.
author: Jerry Lee Lewis

quote: If triangles had a god, they would give him three sides.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: There were times, especially when I was traveling for 'Eat, Pray, Love,' when, I swear to God, I would feel this weight of my female ancestors, all those Swedish farmwives from beyond the grave who were like, 'Go! Go to Naples! Eat more pizza! Go to India, ride an elephant! Do it! Swim in the Indian Ocean. Read those books. Learn a language.'
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: That the saints may enjoy their beatitude and the grace of God more abundantly they are permitted to see the punishment of the damned in hell.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: TO fear God, is one of the first and greatest Duties of his rational Creatures.
author: Charles Inglis

quote: Einstein, stop telling God what to do!
author: Niels Bohr

quote: Today I love myself as I love my god: who could charge me with a sin today? I know only sins against my god but who knows my god?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There's always an element of self delusion among people who believe they ought to be President. There's an underestimation of your opponent and an overestimation of your own abilities. This is compatible with being rich and powerful, the idea that we were blessed by God because we deserve to be blessed.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: For me, Batman is the one that can most clearly be taken seriously. He's not from another planet, or filled with radioactive gunk. I mean, Superman is essentially a god, but Batman is more like Hercules: he's a human being, very flawed, and bridges the divide.
author: Christopher Nolan

quote: We esteem, honor, and love the apostles more than the other saints, because they served God more faithfully and because they loved Him more perfectly.
author: Saint Ignatius

quote: I fear God and next to God I mostly fear them that fear him not.
author: Saadi

quote: God's most lordly gift to man is decency of mind.
author: Aeschylus

quote: One of the peculiar sins of the twentieth century which we've developed to a very high level is the sin of credulity. It has been said that when human beings stop believing in God they believe in nothing. The truth is much worse: they believe in anything.
author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quote: God will never reject you. Whether you accept Him is your decision.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I truly believe that God has given us few brain cells, and you have to direct them to the right things that make you happy.
author: Ranbir Kapoor

quote: I want to know all Gods thoughts all the rest are just details.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If God dropped acid, would he see people?
author: Steven Wright

quote: I would believe only in a God that knows how to Dance.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Silence is the pause in me when I am near to God.
author: Arvo Part

quote: Sorrow is a fruit. God does not make it grow on limbs too weak to bear it.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The Negro revolution is controlled by foxy white liberals, by the Government itself. But the Black Revolution is controlled only by God.
author: Malcolm X

quote: What you see is what you get. My God, I don't have the time nor the energy to live up to some persona.
author: Marc Anthony

quote: Compassion enables you to reach to the heavens and look through the heart of God.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: I cannot persuade myself that a beneficent and omnipotent God would have designedly created parasitic wasps with the express intention of their feeding within the living bodies of Caterpillars.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Scientific views end in awe and mystery, lost at the edge in uncertainty, but they appear to be so deep and so impressive that the theory that it is all arranged as a stage for God to watch man's struggle for good and evil seems inadequate.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: I will far rather see the race of man extinct than that we should become less than beasts by making the noblest of God's creation, woman, the object of our lust.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The sound of 'gentle stillness' after all the thunder and wind have passed will the ultimate Word from God.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: My faith is the grand drama of my life. I'm a believer, so I sing words of God to those who have no faith.
author: Olivier Messiaen

quote: The fundamental idea which defines a human being as a Muslim is the declaration of faith: that there is a creator, whom we call God - or Allah, in Arabic - and that the creator is one and single. And we declare this faith by the declaration of faith, where we... bear witness that there is no God but God.
author: Feisal Abdul Rauf

quote: Don't let anybody make you think God chose America as His divine messianic force to be a sort of policeman of the whole world.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: You're a song written by the hands of God.
author: Shakira

quote: Everything that is bad, the falling sickness - God save the mark - or the like, should be at its worst at the full moon. I suppose because it is the leader of the stars.
author: Lady Gregory

quote: I sometimes think that God in creating man somewhat overestimated his ability.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Some movie stars wear their sunglasses even in church. They're afraid God might recognize them and ask for autographs.
author: Fred Allen

quote: From my own being, and from the dependency I find in myself and my ideas, I do, by an act of reason, necessarily infer the existence of a God, and of all created things in the mind of God.
author: George Berkeley

quote: We turn toward God only to obtain the impossible.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Without God, democracy will not and cannot long endure.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: America is God's Crucible, the great Melting-Pot where all the races of Europe are melting and re-forming!
author: Israel Zangwill

quote: Nothing hath separated us from God but our own will, or rather our own will is our separation from God.
author: William Law

quote: To those who do not love God, all things must work together immediately for pain and torment, until, by means of the tribulation, they are led to salvation at last.
author: Johann Gottlieb Fichte

quote: One either has to believe in a God who's terribly prejudiced, or disbelieve the teachings of such exclusionary theologies. Religions have taught us that 'we are better than they.'
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: For me the goddess is the female of God, She is powerful if different.
author: Tina Turner

quote: The patriot who feels himself in the service of God, who acknowledges Him in all his ways, has the promise of Almighty direction, and will find His Word in his greatest darkness.
author: Francis Scott Key

quote: You seek the heights of manhood when you seek the depths of God.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Live, so you do not have to look back and say: 'God, how I have wasted my life.'
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: I know it's an experience that I need to have if God's putting me through it.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: I was very, very religious. And of course I wrote about it in 'Night.' I questioned God's silence. So I questioned. I don't have an answer for that. Does it mean that I stopped having faith? No. I have faith, but I question it.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: God is not upset that Gandhi was not a Christian, because God is not a Christian! All of God's children and their different faiths help us to realize the immensity of God.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: God's the final judge for Elvis Presley and Johnny Cash too. That's solely in the hands of God.
author: Johnny Cash

quote: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent Him.
author: Voltaire

quote: Since His delights are to be with you, let yours be found in Him.
author: Alphonsus Liguori

quote: Most laws condemn the soul and pronounce sentence. The result of the law of my God is perfect. It condemns but forgives. It restores - more than abundantly - what it takes away.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: Me, I'm spiritually retarded, I need to be knee deep in water with a fly rod in my hands, that's about as close to God as I get.
author: Steve Earle

quote: The finite is annihilated in the presence of the infinite, and becomes a pure nothing. So our spirit before God, so our justice before divine justice.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: He was a wise man who originated the idea of God.
author: Euripides

quote: They always win who side with God.
author: Frederick William Faber

quote: Some of God's greatest gifts are unanswered prayers.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: Nothing that is God's is obtainable by money.
author: Tertullian

quote: Sometimes you ask God for something and you don't know what you're asking.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: Sometimes God writes straightforward in twisted lines.
author: Gloria Trevi

quote: My message is that God is a good God.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: If you must be mad, be it not for the things of the world. Be mad with the love of God.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: Your God is ever beside you - indeed, He is even within you.
author: Alphonsus Liguori

quote: The world sees in our conduct, in our behaviour, the proof that we are the real children of God.
author: Pope Shenouda III

quote: When God hands you a gift, he also hands you a whip; and the whip is intended for self-flagellation solely.
author: Truman Capote

quote: The first revolt is against the supreme tyranny of theology, of the phantom of God. As long as we have a master in heaven, we will be slaves on earth.
author: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: Where love is, there God is also.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The romantic love we feel toward the opposite sex is probably one extra help from God to bring you together, but that's it. All the rest of it, the true love, is the test.
author: Joan Chen

quote: God is everywhere but He is most manifest in man. So serve man as God. That is as good as worshipping God.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: Among the children of God, it was they who were most able to rightly divide the word of truth.
author: John Nelson Darby

quote: The point is that knowledge of God is not prohibited under the First Amendment.
author: Roy Moore

quote: God made the integers all else is the work of man.
author: Leopold Kronecker

quote: I want to love all the children of God - Christian, Jew, Moslem, Hindu, Buddhist - everyone. I want to love gay Christians and straight Christians.
author: Anne Rice

quote: The hardest people to reach with the love of God are not the bad people. They know they are bad. They have no defense. The hardest ones to win for God are the self-righteous people.
author: Charles L. Allen

quote: God comes first - if I don't love him, I can't love anybody, and if I can't love me I can't love nobody.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: And I asked my mother about it; I said, 'Is there something wrong?' She said, 'God... God makes people. You understand that, don't you?' And I said, 'Yeah!' She said, 'Who makes a rainbow?" I said, 'God.' She said, 'I never presumed to tell anyone who could make a rainbow what color to make children.'
author: Richard Dawson

quote: I always say you can never be extravagant with beauty. Beauty is God made real. Beauty is life.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: We are reflections of one another, therefore I know that you are part of me and I am part of you because we are all projections of the universal principles of creation/destruction polarities of the same infinite consciousness that we call God.
author: David Icke

quote: I thought that communism, the tyranny of communism, was an abomination and I beseeched God to bring that terrible evil down and he did. It was a great triumph, it took awhile, but it happened.
author: Pat Robertson

quote: So, if I give any credit, besides giving all credit to God, for being totally healthy, it's just my workout and how much torture I put my body through in the offseason.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: God loves you unconditionally, as you are and not as you should be, because nobody is as they should be.
author: Brennan Manning

quote: What ever disunites man from God, also disunites man from man.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Whatever comes from God is impossible for a man to turn back.
author: Herodotus

quote: Young man, young man, your arm's too short to box with God.
author: James Weldon Johnson

quote: A thick skin is a gift from God.
author: Konrad Adenauer

quote: Reason is God's crowning gift to man.
author: Sophocles

quote: Only God can look at somebody's heart.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Each one of us is an outlet to God and an inlet to God.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: For it pleased God, after he had made all things by the word of his power, to create man after his own image.
author: George Whitefield

quote: The Bible is a revelation of the mind and will of God to men. Therein we may learn, what God is.
author: Jupiter Hammon

quote: The condition upon which God hath given liberty to man is eternal vigilance.
author: John Philpot Curran

quote: God, as Truth, has been for me a treasure beyond price. May He be so to every one of us.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If God had wanted me otherwise, He would have created me otherwise.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: All men are born with a nose and five fingers, but no one is born with a knowledge of God.
author: Voltaire

quote: It is the heart which perceives God and not the reason. That is what faith is: God perceived by the heart, not by the reason.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: After all, God is God because he remembers.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: In myself I am nothing. It all comes from God and the Virgin Mary.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: I've said all along that God is in control.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: Since God knows our future, our personalities, and our capacity to listen, He isn't ever going to say more to us than we can deal with at the moment.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I think that anything that begins to give people a sense of their own worth and dignity is God.
author: John Shelby Spong

quote: God gave me life to continue to do things that I would never have done.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: Of course God will forgive me that's His job.
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: God sent Jesus as an example to see if we could retain and maintain the Holy Spirit in human flesh.
author: Benny Hinn

quote: Sometimes the very presence of God is barred by our presuppositions and our intense and constant desire for triumph.
author: Ravi Zacharias

quote: God is in the sadness and the laughter, in the bitter and the sweet.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: There is nothing unpremeditated, nothing neglected by God. His unsleeping eye beholds all things.
author: Saint Basil

quote: But I know God has big stuff planned that ultimately doesn't have anything to do with me.
author: Michael W. Smith

quote: Many are the names of God and infinite the forms through which He may be approached.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: One must be very particular about telling the truth. Through truth one can realize God.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: Before we can know God and understand his great plan it is first necessary for us to believe that he exists and that he rewards all who diligently seek him.
author: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quote: God is not a cosmic bellboy for whom we can press a button to get things.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: At the cross God wrapped his heart in flesh and blood and let it be nailed to the cross for our redemption.
author: E. Stanley Jones

quote: God in His wisdom has decided that He will reward no works but His own.
author: Johannes Tauler

quote: What I see in the Bible, especially in the book of Psalms, which is a book of gratitude for the created world, is a recognition that all good things on Earth are God's, every good gift is from above. They are good if we recognize where they came from and if we treat them the way the Designer intended them to be treated.
author: Philip Yancey

quote: Each atom of the Holy Spirit is intelligent, and like all other matter has solidity, form, and size, and occupies space.
author: Orson Pratt

quote: People see God every day, they just don't recognize him.
author: Pearl Bailey

quote: Before me, even as behind, God is, and all is well.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: Cast your cares on God that anchor holds.
author: Frank Moore Colby

quote: We are made to know and love God.
author: Nicolas Malebranche

quote: Adoration is caring for God above all else.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: There is no place in my soul, no corner of my character, where God is not.
author: Evelyn Underhill

quote: When it is a question of God's almighty Spirit, never say, 'I can't.'
author: Oswald Chambers

quote: God is one, greatest of gods and men, not like mortals in body or thought.
author: Xenophanes

quote: My walk on the moon lasted three days. My walk with God will last forever.
author: Charles Duke

quote: God, from a beautiful necessity, is Love.
author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quote: God is creating at every moment of the world's existence in and through the perpetually endowed creativity of the very stuff of the world.
author: Arthur Peacocke

quote: The Bible is not man's word about God, but God's word about man.
author: John Barth

quote: Praise God, from whom all blessings flow! Praise Him, all creatures here below! Praise Him above, ye heavenly host! Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost!
author: Thomas Ken

quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The goal of education is not to increase the amount of knowledge but to create the possibilities for a child to invent and discover, to create men who are capable of doing new things.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: Education is not just about going to school and getting a degree. It's about widening your knowledge and absorbing the truth about life.
author: Shakuntala Devi

quote: Human behavior flows from three main sources: desire, emotion, and knowledge.
author: Plato

quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
author: Confucius

quote: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Beware of false knowledge it is more dangerous than ignorance.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people.
author: John Adams

quote: To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge.
author: Confucius

quote: When people rely on surface appearances and false racial stereotypes, rather than in-depth knowledge of others at the level of the heart, mind and spirit, their ability to assess and understand people accurately is compromised.
author: James A. Forbes

quote: We cannot stop natural disasters but we can arm ourselves with knowledge: so many lives wouldn't have to be lost if there was enough disaster preparedness.
author: Petra Nemcova

quote: Design is a way of life, a point of view. It involves the whole complex of visual communications: talent, creative ability, manual skill, and technical knowledge. Aesthetics and economics, technology and psychology are intrinsically related to the process.
author: Paul Rand

quote: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge an argument an exchange of ignorance.
author: Robert Quillen

quote: Where is all the knowledge we lost with information?
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: No man's knowledge here can go beyond his experience.
author: John Locke

quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: The improvement of understanding is for two ends: first, our own increase of knowledge; secondly, to enable us to deliver that knowledge to others.
author: John Locke

quote: Opinion is the medium between knowledge and ignorance.
author: Plato

quote: I believe that through knowledge and discipline, financial peace is possible for all of us.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: It is possible to fly without motors, but not without knowledge and skill.
author: Wilbur Wright

quote: The more knowledge you have, the greater will be your fear of Allah.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: It is beyond a doubt that all our knowledge begins with experience.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: Ultimately, education in its real sense is the pursuit of truth. It is an endless journey through knowledge and enlightenment.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: We know accurately only when we know little, with knowledge doubt increases.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Despite my firm convictions, I have always been a man who tries to face facts, and to accept the reality of life as new experience and new knowledge unfolds. I have always kept an open mind, a flexibility that must go hand in hand with every form of the intelligent search for truth.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Great teachers emanate out of knowledge, passion and compassion.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Wisdom is the right use of knowledge. To know is not to be wise. Many men know a great deal, and are all the greater fools for it. There is no fool so great a fool as a knowing fool. But to know how to use knowledge is to have wisdom.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit. Wisdom is knowing not to put it in a fruit salad.
author: Brian O'Driscoll

quote: Allah says in the Qur'an not to despise one another. So the criterion in Islam is not color or social status. It's who is most righteous. If I go to a mosque - and I'm a basketball player with money and prestige - if I go to a mosque and see an imam, I feel inferior. He's better than me. It's about knowledge.
author: Hakeem Olajuwon

quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Don't only practice your art, but force your way into its secrets; art deserves that, for it and knowledge can raise man to the Divine.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: The end of all knowledge should be service to others.
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: Knowledge of what is does not open the door directly to what should be.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Where there is shouting, there is no true knowledge.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: While many hackers have the knowledge, skills, and tools to attack computer systems, they generally lack the motivation to cause violence or severe economic or social harm.
author: Dorothy Denning

quote: Knowledge has to be improved, challenged, and increased constantly, or it vanishes.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Life is a travelling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Time is only an idea. There is only the Reality. Whatever you think it is, it looks like that. If you call it time, it is time. If you call it existence, it is existence, and so on. After calling it time, you divide it into days and nights, months, years, hours, minutes, etc. Time is immaterial for the Path of Knowledge.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: All our knowledge has its origins in our perceptions.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The greater our knowledge increases the more our ignorance unfolds.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A photographic portrait is a picture of someone who knows he is being photographed, and what he does with this knowledge is as much a part of the photograph as what he's wearing or how he looks.
author: Richard Avedon

quote: The true method of knowledge is experiment.
author: William Blake

quote: Those who have knowledge, don't predict. Those who predict, don't have knowledge.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: One can state, without exaggeration, that the observation of and the search for similarities and differences are the basis of all human knowledge.
author: Alfred Nobel

quote: If you know you are on the right track, if you have this inner knowledge, then nobody can turn you off... no matter what they say.
author: Barbara McClintock

quote: Do not share the knowledge with which you have been blessed with everyone in general, as you do with some people in particular; and know that there are some men in whom Allah, may He be glorified, has placed hidden secrets, which they are forbidden to reveal.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

quote: Probability is expectation founded upon partial knowledge. A perfect acquaintance with all the circumstances affecting the occurrence of an event would change expectation into certainty, and leave nether room nor demand for a theory of probabilities.
author: George Boole

quote: I would encourage you: be informed - knowledge is power.
author: Matt Bevin

quote: The mark of higher education isn't the knowledge you accumulate in your head. It's the skills you gain about how to learn.
author: Adam Grant

quote: We fear that this moment will end, that we won't get what we need, that we will lose what we love, or that we will not be safe. Often, our biggest fear is the knowledge that one day our bodies will cease functioning. So even when we are surrounded by all the conditions for happiness, our joy is not complete.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The natural desire of good men is knowledge.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Without knowledge action is useless and knowledge without action is futile.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: Zeal will do more than knowledge.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Someone who has experienced trauma also has gifts to offer all of us - in their depth, their knowledge of our universal vulnerability, and their experience of the power of compassion.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: Let us tenderly and kindly cherish, therefore, the means of knowledge. Let us dare to read, think, speak, and write.
author: John Adams

quote: Wonder is the desire for knowledge.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: You are the master of your own ship, pal. There are lots of people who fall into troubled waters and don't have the guts or the knowledge or the ability to make it to shore. They have nobody to blame but themselves.
author: Evel Knievel

quote: Knowledge without justice ought to be called cunning rather than wisdom.
author: Plato

quote: Three passions, simple but overwhelmingly strong, have governed my life: the longing for love, the search for knowledge, and unbearable pity for the suffering of mankind.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Humility and knowledge in poor clothes excel pride and ignorance in costly attire.
author: William Penn

quote: The knowledge from an enlightened person breaks on the hard rocks of ignorance.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
